translated: How can something arise from something dissimilar, and yet be similar to it?

original: de ni de dang 'dra ba la ma byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni de dang 'dra ba la ma byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it does not arise from that which is similar to it, it will be similar to that.

original: mi 'dra ba las de dang 'dra ba 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba las de dang 'dra ba 'gyur na ni /
translated: If something similar to it arises from something dissimilar to it,

original: de dag gi nus pa ma nges pa'i phyir rgyu'i tha dad pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: de dag gi nus pa ma nges pa'i phyir rgyu'i tha dad pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin pas /
translated: then the difference in causes would not make a difference, because their potency would be uncertain.

original: mtha' dag gi sna tshogs nyid rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: mtha' dag gi sna tshogs nyid rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The diversity of everything would be without a cause,

original: thams cad las thams cad skye par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad las thams cad skye par 'gyur ro //
translated: or everything would arise from everything.

original: de lta bas na rgyu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa dag gis 'bras bu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa dag yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na rgyu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa dag gis 'bras bu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa dag yin no //
translated: Therefore, the effect is different or non-different from the cause, depending on whether the cause is different or non-different.

original: de bas na du ba ni mthong pa'i rnam pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i don las mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: de bas na du ba ni mthong pa'i rnam pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i don las mi 'byung ste /
translated: Thus, smoke does not arise from a thing that is dissimilar to what is seen,

original: rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that it would be without a cause.

original: de lta ma yin te //
analyzed: de lta ma yin te //
translated: If it were not so,

original: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
analyzed: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
translated: Because it is causeless and does not depend on another,

original: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
translated: it would either always exist or never exist.

original: dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung ba ltos pa las yin no //üîΩdu ba de rgyu med pa las 'byung na ni ltos pa med pa'i phyir nam yang mi 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung ba ltos pa las yin no // du ba de rgyu med pa las 'byung na ni ltos pa med pa'i phyir nam yang mi 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Things that sometimes occur do so in dependence.

original: de 'byung ba la ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dus bzhin no //
analyzed: de 'byung ba la ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i dus bzhin no //
translated: If smoke were to occur without a cause, it would never not occur, because it would not lack the completeness of causes for its occurrence, just as it is desired to occur.

original: yang na ni de'i tshe yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na ni de'i tshe yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Or, it would not occur even at the time it is desired to occur,

original: med pa'i dus dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i dus dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no difference between the time it does not exist and the time it is desired to occur.

original: dngos po ltos pa rnams ni res 'ga' bar 'gyur te /üîΩyod pa dang med pa'i dus dag na de 'byung bar rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po ltos pa rnams ni res 'ga' bar 'gyur te / yod pa dang med pa'i dus dag na de 'byung bar rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Things that depend sometimes occur,üîΩbecause they are suitable or not suitable to occur at times when they exist or do not exist.

original: yul dang dus rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid 'dra ba can dag la ni de dang ldan pa dang / cig shos dag tu nges par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid 'dra ba can dag la ni de dang ldan pa dang / cig shos dag tu nges par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not suitable for those that have similar suitability or unsuitability in terms of place and time to definitely occur or not occur in other places and times.

original: rung ba nyid de yang rgyu'i dngos po las gzhan yin nam ci /
analyzed: rung ba nyid de yang rgyu'i dngos po las gzhan yin nam ci /
translated: And is that suitability something other than the thing that is the cause?

original: de'i phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas yul dang dus gzhan dag na yod pa'i dngos po ni de dag la ltos pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas yul dang dus gzhan dag na yod pa'i dngos po ni de dag la ltos pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, when a thing exists in some place and time, having been excluded from some other place and time, it is said to be ‚Äúdependent on those.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar de ltar yod pa nyid ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ltar yod pa nyid ltos pa yin no //
translated: In this way, its existence is dependent.

original: de dag gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi @273b ltos pa ni der nges par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi @273b ltos pa ni der nges par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not suitable to be ascertained as that without relying on the benefit that is produced by those.

original: de bas na yul dang dus nges pa'i phyir gang na du ba lan cig mthong la ma tshang na ma mthong ba ni 'di'i des bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: de bas na yul dang dus nges pa'i phyir gang na du ba lan cig mthong la ma tshang na ma mthong ba ni 'di'i des bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, because it is restricted to a particular place and time, it is the nature of that which is produced by smoke when it is seen in one place and not seen when it is not there.

original: gzhan du na don lan 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na don lan 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be meaningless.

original: de der nges pa yin na ji ltar gzhan pa las 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de der nges pa yin na ji ltar gzhan pa las 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: If it were restricted to that, how could it arise from something else?

original: 'byung ba na ni du ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'byung ba na ni du ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If it did arise from something else, it would not be smoke.

original: du ba ni des bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: du ba ni des bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin no //
translated: Smoke is a particular nature that is produced by that.

original: de bzhin du rgyu yang 'bras bu de lta bu bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu yang 'bras bu de lta bu bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: In the same way, the cause is the nature of producing such an effect.

original: de gzhan las kyang 'byung na ni de de'i rang bzhin ma yin pas lan 'ga' yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzhan las kyang 'byung na ni de de'i rang bzhin ma yin pas lan 'ga' yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it arose from another, it would not be the nature of that, and it would not produce it even once.

original: yang na de du ba ma yin te du ba bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na de du ba ma yin te du ba bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, it would not be smoke, because it would arise from what is not the nature of producing smoke.

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni de nyid ma yin pas 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni de nyid ma yin pas 'khrul pa med do //
translated: If it were its nature, it would not be that, and so there would be no error.

original: gal te brgya byin spyi bo me'i //üîΩrang bzhin yin na de nyid me //
analyzed: gal te brgya byin spyi bo me'i // rang bzhin yin na de nyid me //
translated: If the head of Indra were the nature of fire,üîΩit would be fire itself.

original: 'o na te de me'i rang bzhin min //
analyzed: 'o na te de me'i rang bzhin min //
translated: But if it is not the nature of fire,

original: ji ltar de las du ba 'byung //
analyzed: ji ltar de las du ba 'byung //
translated: how does smoke arise from it?

original: du ba'i rgyu yi rang bzhin me //
analyzed: du ba'i rgyu yi rang bzhin me //
translated: The nature of the cause of smoke is fire,

original: de yi nus pa'i bye brag ldan //üîΩdu ba du ba'i rgyu min las //
analyzed: de yi nus pa'i bye brag ldan // du ba du ba'i rgyu min las //
translated: which possesses the particular power of that.üîΩIf smoke arose from what is not the cause of smoke,

original: 'byung na de ni rgyu med 'gyur //
analyzed: 'byung na de ni rgyu med 'gyur //
translated: it would arise without a cause.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is a summarizing verse.

original: 'o na da ni ji ltar lhan cig byed pa tha dad pa las 'bras bu skye ste /
analyzed: 'o na da ni ji ltar lhan cig byed pa tha dad pa las 'bras bu skye ste /
translated: But how can an effect arise from a collection of different co-operating causes?

original: dper na mig dang gzugs la sogs pa las rnam par shes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: dper na mig dang gzugs la sogs pa las rnam par shes pa lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: For example, consciousness arises from the eye, form, etc.

original: de'i rang bzhin gcig pus skyed par byed pa ni cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gcig pus skyed par byed pa ni cung zad kyang med do //
translated: There is nothing that is produced by a single cause.

original: 'on kyang tshogs pas skyed par byed pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin te /üîΩde kho na rjes su dpag go //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshogs pas skyed par byed pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin te / de kho na rjes su dpag go //
translated: But the collection of causes is the nature of the producer.üîΩWe infer that from the fact that the effect is present when the collection is present.

original: tshogs pa de nyid 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i rten yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa de nyid 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i rten yin no //
translated: The collection itself is the basis for the presence of the effect.

original: de nyid kyi phyir lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang rnam grangs med par skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang rnam grangs med par skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: For this reason, the co-operating causes are the unshared producers.

original: gang yang cung zad lci ba la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa las autpala la sogs pa 'byung bar mthong ba de la yang de skad du brjod kyang rang gi sa bon las rab tu byung ba can yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa yod
analyzed: gang yang cung zad lci ba la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa las autpala la sogs pa 'byung bar mthong ba de la yang de skad du brjod kyang rang gi sa bon las rab tu byung ba can yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa yod
translated: Even when a different type of effect, such as a heavy weight, is seen to arise from a different type of cause, such as a lotus, etc., we say that it arises from its own seed because it has the same nature.

original: pa kho na ste /
analyzed: pa kho na ste /
translated: It is only the latter.üîΩüîΩ

original: rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir dper na chu shing gi sa bon dang sdong bu las skye ba can lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir dper na chu shing gi sa bon dang sdong bu las skye ba can lta bu'o //
translated: because the nature of the cause is different. For example, it is like the seed and the sprout of the plantain tree.

original: de lta bu ni 'jig rten na gsal ba kho nar rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo nas rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: de lta bu ni 'jig rten na gsal ba kho nar rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo nas rnam par 'byed do //
translated: Such a cause is clearly distinguished in the world by way of its difference.

original: de lta @274a * //
analyzed: de lta @274a * //
translated: Thus,

original: bas na shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa can gyi 'bras bus ni rgyu 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: bas na shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa can gyi 'bras bus ni rgyu 'khrul pa med do //
translated: the cause is not mistaken by the effect that has a very distinct form.

original: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las //
translated: From the following and the cessation,

original: gang zhig gang gi rjes 'gror mthong //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rjes 'gror mthong //
translated: that which is seen to follow from what,

original: de yi rang bzhin de'i rgyu can //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin de'i rgyu can //
translated: has that as its nature and has that as its cause.

original: de phyir mi mthun las mi 'byung //
analyzed: de phyir mi mthun las mi 'byung //
translated: Therefore, it does not arise from what is incompatible.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is the concluding verse.

original: de lta bas na lan cig mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba dag gis kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bas na lan cig mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba dag gis kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, the nature of cause and effect is established even by a single instance of seeing and not seeing.

original: des de rtogs kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des de rtogs kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is understood by that, but not by another.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ma lus par mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba la rag lus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ma lus par mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba la rag lus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the presence and absence of the effect is dependent on the presence and absence of the cause, respectively.

original: lus can ma yin pa nyid 'ga' zhig la rtag pa nyid mthong yang gzhan la gzhan du mthong ba'i phyir dang / rtag pa nyid med pa 'ga' zhig la ma mthong ba yang mthong ba'i phyir ro /üîΩ// / bam po gnyis pa /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa nyid 'ga' zhig la rtag pa nyid mthong yang gzhan la gzhan du mthong ba'i phyir dang / rtag pa nyid med pa 'ga' zhig la ma mthong ba yang mthong ba'i phyir ro / // / bam po gnyis pa /
translated: Even though one sees permanence in some things that are not bodies, one sees otherwise in others, and even though one does not see permanence in some things that are not bodies, one sees it in others.

original: 'bras bu ni de las skye ba'i phyir rgyu med na mi 'byung ba yin la rag na /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de las skye ba'i phyir rgyu med na mi 'byung ba yin la rag na /
translated: If the effect does not occur in the absence of the cause, because it arises from that,

original: da rang bzhin ji ltar med na mi 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: da rang bzhin ji ltar med na mi 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
translated: then how could the essential nature not occur in the absence of the essential nature?

original: rang bzhin la yang med mi 'byung //
analyzed: rang bzhin la yang med mi 'byung //
translated: Essential nature does not occur in the absence of essential nature.

original: yod pa tsam dang 'brel pa yin //üîΩgang zhig yod pa tsam dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de la ni yod pa med na mi 'byung bar 'dod de /
analyzed: yod pa tsam dang 'brel pa yin // gang zhig yod pa tsam dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de la ni yod pa med na mi 'byung bar 'dod de /
translated: It is related to mere existence.üîΩThat which is related to mere existence as its essential nature is maintained to be nonexistent in the absence of existence.

original: de med par ni yod pa dag / med 'gyur tha dad med phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par ni yod pa dag / med 'gyur tha dad med phyir ro //
translated: Because if it existed, it would not be different from that.

original: ngo bo gang kho na yod pa tsam la rag las pa'i rang bzhin yin par brjod pa de kho na rang gis dngos su yod pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo gang kho na yod pa tsam la rag las pa'i rang bzhin yin par brjod pa de kho na rang gis dngos su yod pa yin no //
translated: That nature which is said to be dependent on the mere existence of a thing is the thing‚Äôs own nature.

original: de yang bdag nyid bor nas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: de yang bdag nyid bor nas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
translated: And how could it exist if it were to abandon its own nature?

original: 'o na ni tha dad pa med pa'i phyir byas pa gang yin pa de nyid mi rtag pa yin pas dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni tha dad pa med pa'i phyir byas pa gang yin pa de nyid mi rtag pa yin pas dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if that which is produced is the same as that which is impermanent, then the probandum is part of the reason.

original: de ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de ni nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault here.üîΩBecause all things

original: gang phyir dngos kun rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: gang phyir dngos kun rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By their very nature

original: rang rang ngo bo la gnas phyir //
analyzed: rang rang ngo bo la gnas phyir //
translated: Abide in their own nature,

original: mthun dngos gzhan gyi dngos dag las //üîΩldog pa la ni rten pa can //
analyzed: mthun dngos gzhan gyi dngos dag las // ldog pa la ni rten pa can //
translated: They are distinguished from other things.

original: de phyir gang dang gang las don //üîΩldog pa de yi rgyu can gyi //
analyzed: de phyir gang dang gang las don // ldog pa de yi rgyu can gyi //
translated: Therefore, the distinction of a thing

original: rigs dbye de yi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: rigs dbye de yi khyad par gyis //
translated: From other things is the basis for the classification of its causes.üîΩThe distinction of its causes

original: rtogs 'gyur ba dag rab tu byed //
analyzed: rtogs 'gyur ba dag rab tu byed //
translated: Is understood through the distinction of its effects.

original: de phyir khyad par gang zhig chos //
analyzed: de phyir khyad par gang zhig chos //
translated: Therefore, the distinction of a thing

original: gang gis go bar 'gyur ba de //
analyzed: gang gis go bar 'gyur ba de //
translated: Is understood through the distinction of its causes.

original: de las gzhan gyis nus ma yin //
analyzed: de las gzhan gyis nus ma yin //
translated: It is not possible for it to be otherwise.

original: des na tha dad rnam par gnas //
analyzed: des na tha dad rnam par gnas //
translated: Therefore, it is established that they are different.

original: @274b dngos po thams cad ni rang gi ngo bo la gnas pa can kho na yin no //
analyzed: @274b dngos po thams cad ni rang gi ngo bo la gnas pa can kho na yin no //
translated: All things exist in their own nature.

original: de dag ni rang dang gzhan du 'dre bar mi byed de //
analyzed: de dag ni rang dang gzhan du 'dre bar mi byed de //
translated: They do not mix with each other,

original: de gzhan ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gzhan ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that they would not be different.

original: gang yang 'di dag gi rang bdag nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo tha mi dad pa de ni de dag gi ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang 'di dag gi rang bdag nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo tha mi dad pa de ni de dag gi ma yin te /
translated: That which is not different from their own nature is not theirs,

original: de'i tshe de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time they do not exist.

original: de kho na yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de kho na yin par 'gyur te /
translated: It would be that itself,

original: tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang / de las ma gtogs pa tha dad pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang / de las ma gtogs pa tha dad pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different and because there is no difference apart from it.

original: de nyid tha dad par ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid tha dad par ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is contradictory for it to be different from that itself.

original: de yang bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pas ma 'dres pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de yang bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pas ma 'dres pa kho na yin no //
translated: And it is only unmixed, because it exists in its own nature.

original: don gzhan yang du ma dang 'brel du zin kyang de ni de dag gi spyi ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan yang du ma dang 'brel du zin kyang de ni de dag gi spyi ma yin te /
translated: Even though another object is related to many, it is not their generality,üîΩbecause it is not different from them.

original: de'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the nature of that.

original: gnyis nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'bras bu'i rdzas dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'bras bu'i rdzas dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And it would follow that the two, etc., would be possessed of the substance of the effect.

original: 'brel pa can gzhan gyis kyang gzhan dag mtshungs pa ni ma yin gyi de dang ldan pa dag tu ni 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'brel pa can gzhan gyis kyang gzhan dag mtshungs pa ni ma yin gyi de dang ldan pa dag tu ni 'gyur te /
translated: And it is not that another related object is similar to another, but they become possessed of that.

original: 'byung po'i mgul chings lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'byung po'i mgul chings lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a charm worn around the neck.

original: shes pa tha mi dad pa'i yul yang ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa tha mi dad pa'i yul yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the object of a non-different cognition,

original: 'byung po bzhin no //
analyzed: 'byung po bzhin no //
translated: like a spirit.

original: blo ni de dag gi bdag nyid kho na bsre zhing spyi'i yul can du snang gi gcig dang 'brel ba can dag go zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: blo ni de dag gi bdag nyid kho na bsre zhing spyi'i yul can du snang gi gcig dang 'brel ba can dag go zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The cognition is mixed with their nature and appears to have a universal as its object, but it is not that it is related to one of them.

original: 'byung po lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'byung po lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a spirit.

original: gal te de ni de mthong ba'i 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ni de mthong ba'i 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is an error in seeing that,

original: de mthong ngo zhes bya ba gang las /
analyzed: de mthong ngo zhes bya ba gang las /
translated: then what is it that is said to see that?

original: gal te 'khrul pa sa bon med pa can mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa sa bon med pa can mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is not tenable that an error lacks a seed,

original: 'bras bu de gcig pa can de dag kho na sa bon yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu de gcig pa can de dag kho na sa bon yin no //
translated: then those that have that effect are the seeds.

original: grangs dang ldan pa dang / 'bras bu'i rjes la sogs pa dang ldan pa dag dang / 'byung po la sogs pa la yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs dang ldan pa dang / 'bras bu'i rjes la sogs pa dang ldan pa dag dang / 'byung po la sogs pa la yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not possessed by number, by the effect, etc., and by the elements, etc.

original: de bas na de ltar spyi'i blo la zhen pa med pa'i phyir spyi ni gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de ltar spyi'i blo la zhen pa med pa'i phyir spyi ni gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is no attachment to a cognition of the universal in that way, the universal is not different.

original: yod du chug na yang de yang rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir gzhan dang ma 'dres pa yin no //
analyzed: yod du chug na yang de yang rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir gzhan dang ma 'dres pa yin no //
translated: Even if it were to exist, it would be undifferentiated from the other, because it is restricted to its own nature.

original: de lta bas na dngos po 'di dag ni rigs mi mthun par 'dod pa dang gzhan las log pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na dngos po 'di dag ni rigs mi mthun par 'dod pa dang gzhan las log pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, these entities are asserted to be of different types and to be the opposite of other,

original: rang gi ngo bos ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are of one nature by way of their own nature.

original: gang dang gang las tha dad pa de'i dbye ba shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gang dang gang las tha dad pa de'i dbye ba shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to make known the differentiation of that which is different from this or that,

original: tha snyad du byas pa'i sgra dag gis de dang de las tha dad pa rgyur byas nas ngo bo nyid tha mi dad kyang chos du ma shes pa ma @275a * //
analyzed: tha snyad du byas pa'i sgra dag gis de dang de las tha dad pa rgyur byas nas ngo bo nyid tha mi dad kyang chos du ma shes pa ma @275a * //
translated: the words that are used make that which is different from this or that the cause, and although there is no difference in nature, they make known many phenomena.

original: byed do // sgra de dag kyang tha dad pa thams cad mi 'phen yang tha dad pa gcig brjod pas de'i rang gi mtshan nyid dbyis phyin pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: byed do // sgra de dag kyang tha dad pa thams cad mi 'phen yang tha dad pa gcig brjod pas de'i rang gi mtshan nyid dbyis phyin pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: And those words, although they do not imply all the differences, do express one difference, and so they do indeed express the specific property of the thing.

original: de gcig dang yang de tha dad pa yang bas so //
analyzed: de gcig dang yang de tha dad pa yang bas so //
translated: For that one thing is different from that other.

original: de lta bas na dngos po gcig la gzhan gyi ngo bo ji snyed pa de la ltos nas ldog pa de snyid yod de /
analyzed: de lta bas na dngos po gcig la gzhan gyi ngo bo ji snyed pa de la ltos nas ldog pa de snyid yod de /
translated: Thus, in regard to one thing, there are as many exclusions as there are other entities in dependence upon which it is conceived.

original: de la med pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can ni de las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩldog pa ji snyed pa de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can ma yin pa yongs su spang bar tha snyad kyi don can gyi sgra dag kyang de snyed de /
analyzed: de la med pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can ni de las tha dad pa'i phyir ro // ldog pa ji snyed pa de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can ma yin pa yongs su spang bar tha snyad kyi don can gyi sgra dag kyang de snyed de /
translated: And the cause and effect of that exclusion is different from that.üîΩAnd there are as many words that express the meaning of a convention as there are causes and effects of the exclusion.

original: dper na sgra ni stsal ma thag tu 'byung ba can dang nyan pa can yin no zhes bya ba de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can ma yin pa yongs su spang ba'i don yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra ni stsal ma thag tu 'byung ba can dang nyan pa can yin no zhes bya ba de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu can ma yin pa yongs su spang ba'i don yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the words, ‚ÄúSound is produced by effort and is heard,‚Äù have the purpose of excluding what is not its cause and effect.

original: de'i phyir ngo bo nyid tha mi dad kyis kyang khyad par gyi bye brag gang zhig ming gi chos gang gis go bar 'gyur ba de ni gzhan gyis go bar mi nus pas sgra thams cad ni don gcig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo bo nyid tha mi dad kyis kyang khyad par gyi bye brag gang zhig ming gi chos gang gis go bar 'gyur ba de ni gzhan gyis go bar mi nus pas sgra thams cad ni don gcig pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though the nature of the word and the object are not different, the particular distinction of the object is understood by a particular word, and it cannot be understood by another word. Therefore, all words do not have the same meaning.

original: de bas na dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, one part of the meaning of the thesis is not the reason.

original: yang sgra dang rtags dag gis rnam par bcad pa rtogs par byed kyi /
analyzed: yang sgra dang rtags dag gis rnam par bcad pa rtogs par byed kyi /
translated: Moreover, how do you know that words and signs make known the exclusion,

original: bsgrubs pas dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo kho na ma yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: bsgrubs pas dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo kho na ma yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar shes she na /
translated: and not the entity itself that is affirmed?

original: tshad ma gzhan dang sgra gzhan 'jug pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan dang sgra gzhan 'jug pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because another valid cognition and another word are applied.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig //
analyzed: 'di ltar / don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig //
translated: The nature of the object is one.

original: bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la /
analyzed: bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la /
translated: It is directly perceived by itself.

original: tshad ma rnams kyis brtag bya gang //
analyzed: tshad ma rnams kyis brtag bya gang //
translated: What is to be examined by valid cognitions

original: ma mthong cha gzhan ci zhig yod //
analyzed: ma mthong cha gzhan ci zhig yod //
translated: is not seen to have any other part.

original: don gyi bdag nyid gcig pa de ni mngon sum pa yin te /
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid gcig pa de ni mngon sum pa yin te /
translated: That one nature of the object is directly perceived.

original: chos can ma grub na sgrub na sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can ma grub na sgrub na sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if the subject is not established, it is impossible to establish the probandum.

original: dper na mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la sgra lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na mi rtag pa bsgrub par bya ba la sgra lta bu ste /
translated: For example, in the proof of sound as impermanent,

original: de'i mngon sum kho nas grub pas rnam pa thams cad 'grub ste /
analyzed: de'i mngon sum kho nas grub pas rnam pa thams cad 'grub ste /
translated: since it is established by direct perception itself, all aspects are established,

original: de las gzhan pa ma grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ma grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is nothing else to be established apart from that.

original: 'on te yong na ni de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te yong na ni de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
translated: But if it is established, it is not the nature of that.

original: gang zhig gang dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa can ma yin pa de ni de'i ngo bo nyid yin par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa can ma yin pa de ni de'i ngo bo nyid yin par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not established and does not have the same nature as something else cannot be the nature of that,

original: tha dad pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ni de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ni de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is the extent of the cause for the designation of difference.

original: de lta ma yin na med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Otherwise, it would absurdly follow that it does not exist.

original: de'i phyir chos can mngon sum pa de'i ngo bo nyid mtha' dag yongs su bcad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can mngon sum pa de'i ngo bo nyid mtha' dag yongs su bcad pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the entire nature of that directly perceived subject is ascertained,

original: de la tshad ma gzhan 'jug @275b pa'i go skabs med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la tshad ma gzhan 'jug @275b pa'i go skabs med par 'gyur ro //
translated: there is no opportunity for another valid cognition to engage.

original: gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las //
analyzed: gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las //
translated: From seeing the concordant attributes,

original: nya phyis la dngul rnam pa ltar //
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul rnam pa ltar //
translated: like the silver in a shell.

original: gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
translated: If, because of the appearance of error,

original: yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na //
analyzed: yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na //
translated: one does not apply the other qualities,

original: gal te dngos po de kho na nyid thams cad mthong ba can la yang ji ltar nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam pa lta bur de ltar nges pa'i gags su gyur pa'i khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis yon tan gzhan sbyor bar mi byed na'o //
analyzed: gal te dngos po de kho na nyid thams cad mthong ba can la yang ji ltar nya phyis la dngul gyi rnam pa lta bur de ltar nges pa'i gags su gyur pa'i khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis yon tan gzhan sbyor bar mi byed na'o //
translated: If, even though one sees the reality of the thing, one does not apply the other qualities because of the appearance of error which is the obstacle to the ascertainment of the thing, as in the case of the silver in a shell,

original: nya phyis la ni mtshungs pa dang / khyad par can dang ngo bos gnyis yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nya phyis la ni mtshungs pa dang / khyad par can dang ngo bos gnyis yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: then the shell is not both the same and different in substance,

original: de ltar rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it would be perceived as such.

original: bye brag tu mi rtogs na ni gnyis nyid du rtag pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag tu mi rtogs na ni gnyis nyid du rtag pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is not perceived as such, then it is not possible that it is both, because it is not possible that it be permanent, and because it would follow that it would be perceived as such.

original: de lta bas na nya phyis kyi gzugs mthong bas khyad par kho na mthong la /
analyzed: de lta bas na nya phyis kyi gzugs mthong bas khyad par kho na mthong la /
translated: Therefore, when one sees the form of a shell, one sees only the particular.

original: nges pa'i rkyen ma tshang ba'i phyir gtan la ma phebs pas de'i spyi mthong ngo snyam du rlom par byed do //
analyzed: nges pa'i rkyen ma tshang ba'i phyir gtan la ma phebs pas de'i spyi mthong ngo snyam du rlom par byed do //
translated: Because the definitive condition is incomplete, it is not ascertained, and so one imagines that one sees its universal.

original: de'i phyir 'di dngul du sgro 'dogs shing de ltar 'dra ba gzhan skye bas tha dad pa nyid du ma 'khrigs pas de'i ngo bor sgro btags pa'i phyir gnas par 'khrul lo //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dngul du sgro 'dogs shing de ltar 'dra ba gzhan skye bas tha dad pa nyid du ma 'khrigs pas de'i ngo bor sgro btags pa'i phyir gnas par 'khrul lo //
translated: Therefore, one superimposes silver on it, and because another similar one arises, one does not discern its difference, and so one mistakes it as being that.

original: 'di la gzhan gyi dngos po ji snyed pa rang gi rgyu mtshan ji lta ba las 'byung ba'i sgro 'dogs pa yang de snyed kho na yin pas de rnam par gcod pa'i tshad ma rnams 'byung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di la gzhan gyi dngos po ji snyed pa rang gi rgyu mtshan ji lta ba las 'byung ba'i sgro 'dogs pa yang de snyed kho na yin pas de rnam par gcod pa'i tshad ma rnams 'byung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas par 'byung ngo //
translated: Here, superimposition arises from the mere appearance of the object of superimposition, and the valid cognitions that eliminate it arise with a result, because there are only as many superimpositions as there are other entities, and they are eliminated in just that way.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can de dag ni dngos po'i cha shas ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can de dag ni dngos po'i cha shas ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: Those that have the result of elimination do not operate to realize what has not been realized of a part of an entity.

original: cha shas med pa la phyogs gcig mthong ba mi rung ba'i phyir de ni mthong zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cha shas med pa la phyogs gcig mthong ba mi rung ba'i phyir de ni mthong zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible to see a part of a partless object, it has already been seen.

original: de phyir dngos po mthong ba yi //
analyzed: de phyir dngos po mthong ba yi //
translated: Therefore, when one sees a thing,

original: yon tan mtha' dag mthong ba nyid //
analyzed: yon tan mtha' dag mthong ba nyid //
translated: one sees all of its properties.

original: 'khrul pas nges par mi byed pas //
analyzed: 'khrul pas nges par mi byed pas //
translated: Since error does not occur,

original: sgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: sgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa yin //
translated: the proof is established.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is the concluding verse.

original: de lta bas na mthong ba la mthong ba gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bas na mthong ba la mthong ba gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, in order to apprehend what is seen,

original: tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: another valid cognition does not operate with regard to it.

original: rjes su dpag pa las kyang dngos //üîΩ'dzin na chos gcig nges gyur pas //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa las kyang dngos // 'dzin na chos gcig nges gyur pas //
translated: Also, when a thing is established by inference,üîΩif it is apprehended, since one property is ascertained,

original: chos can 'dzin te sel ba la //
analyzed: chos can 'dzin te sel ba la //
translated: the subject is apprehended, but

original: nyes pa 'dir ni thal mi 'gyur //üîΩgang zhig mngon sum gyis mthong ba la tshad ma gzhan mi 'jug pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: nyes pa 'dir ni thal mi 'gyur // gang zhig mngon sum gyis mthong ba la tshad ma gzhan mi 'jug pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: this fault does not ensue in the case of exclusion.üîΩNot only does another valid cognition not operate with regard to what is seen by direct perception,

original: @276a * // gang gi tshe rjes su dpag pas kyang bsgrubs pas dngos po rtogs par byed kyi rnam par gcod par byed pa ni ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: @276a * // gang gi tshe rjes su dpag pas kyang bsgrubs pas dngos po rtogs par byed kyi rnam par gcod par byed pa ni ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: but also when a thing is understood by inference, it is established, but it is not apprehended.

original: chos gcig nges na de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nges pas tshad ma gzhan mi 'jug ste /
analyzed: chos gcig nges na de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nges pas tshad ma gzhan mi 'jug ste /
translated: If one thing is ascertained, all things are ascertained because they are not different from that one thing. Therefore, another valid cognition does not engage.

original: de nges na de'i bdag nyid ma nges pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nges na de'i bdag nyid ma nges pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: If that is ascertained, it is not logical that its nature is not ascertained.

original: gang gi tshe rjes su dpag pas sgro 'dogs pa rnam par gcod par byed pa de'i tshe ni gcig gis sgro 'dogs pa rnam par bcad pas gzhan rnam par bcad pa byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rjes su dpag pas sgro 'dogs pa rnam par gcod par byed pa de'i tshe ni gcig gis sgro 'dogs pa rnam par bcad pas gzhan rnam par bcad pa byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When inference eliminates superimposition, at that time, since one eliminates superimposition, the other does not eliminate it.

original: de'i don du gzhan 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i don du gzhan 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Another would engage for that purpose.

original: ma rtogs pa nges par 'gyur ba ni phyin ci log sngon du 'gro ba can kho na yin par nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa nges par 'gyur ba ni phyin ci log sngon du 'gro ba can kho na yin par nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't it certain that what is not understood is ascertained only through what precedes it?

original: dper na du ba glo bur ba las me rtogs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na du ba glo bur ba las me rtogs pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is like the understanding of fire from a momentary smoke.

original: de la ni me ma yin par sgro 'dogs par mi srid do //
analyzed: de la ni me ma yin par sgro 'dogs par mi srid do //
translated: In that case, it is impossible to superimpose that it is not fire.

original: de bas na thams cad la rnam par gcod par byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na thams cad la rnam par gcod par byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not that everything is eliminated.

original: 'di la chos can rtogs na tha mi dad pa'i phyir thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la chos can rtogs na tha mi dad pa'i phyir thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object is realized, then everything is realized, because there is no difference between them.

original: 'on te tha dad na ma 'brel pa ni de la rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: 'on te tha dad na ma 'brel pa ni de la rtogs pa med do //
translated: But if they are different, then there is no realization of that object by that cognition, because they are not related.

original: zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: de'i phyir de la yang de mthong ba la de'i rang gi ngo bo ma nges pa ni ga las she na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la yang de mthong ba la de'i rang gi ngo bo ma nges pa ni ga las she na /
translated: Therefore, how can the object be ascertained as the nature of that cognition, if that object is not seen by that cognition?

original: phyin ci log kho na las yin no //
analyzed: phyin ci log kho na las yin no //
translated: It is only a mistake.

original: da yang phyogs de blo me dang ldan par 'dzin pa dang bral bas /
analyzed: da yang phyogs de blo me dang ldan par 'dzin pa dang bral bas /
translated: Now, when the cognition is free from the apprehension of that object,

original: des dben pa'i ngo bor nges par byed pa na ji ltar phyin ci log ma yin /
analyzed: des dben pa'i ngo bor nges par byed pa na ji ltar phyin ci log ma yin /
translated: how can it be non-erroneous when it ascertains the object as devoid of that object?

original: de'i rnam par sgro 'dogs pa dang the tshom dang bral ba ni de rtogs par bya ba la rtogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: de'i rnam par sgro 'dogs pa dang the tshom dang bral ba ni de rtogs par bya ba la rtogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi byed /
translated: When it is free from superimposition and doubt regarding that form, it realizes that object, but does not follow it.

original: de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag la gus par yang mi byed do //üîΩde phyir de ltar rtags sel ba'i //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag la gus par yang mi byed do // de phyir de ltar rtags sel ba'i //
translated: It does not respect the concomitance and absence of that object.üîΩTherefore, it is well known that

original: yul can yin par rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: yul can yin par rab tu bsgrags //
translated: the cognition is the subject that eliminates the object.

original: gzhan du chos can grub gyur na //
analyzed: gzhan du chos can grub gyur na //
translated: Otherwise, if the subject were established,

original: de las ma grub gzhan ci yod //
analyzed: de las ma grub gzhan ci yod //
translated: what else could be established except that?

original: ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is the summary verse.üîΩThat cognition which is of a universal object

original: mthong ba 'ga' la shes pa gang //
analyzed: mthong ba 'ga' la shes pa gang //
translated: in regard to something seen,

original: spyi yi don can rnam rtog pa //üîΩgzhan gyi cha sgro ma btags pa //
analyzed: spyi yi don can rnam rtog pa // gzhan gyi cha sgro ma btags pa //
translated: is conceptual,

original: de tsam sel ba'i spyod yul can //
analyzed: de tsam sel ba'i spyod yul can //
translated: and has an object which is a mere exclusion of the contrary.

original: gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba'i mjug thogs su rtags can ma yin pa'i nges pa'i shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de sgro 'dogs pa med na ji ltar rnam par gcod pa'i yul can du @276b 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba'i mjug thogs su rtags can ma yin pa'i nges pa'i shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de sgro 'dogs pa med na ji ltar rnam par gcod pa'i yul can du @276b 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can that cognition which is non-erroneous in regard to the exclusion of the contrary, be a subject which has an object which is a mere exclusion?

original: sgro ma btags pa'i yul la yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgang la 'di'i sgro 'dogs pa dper na brten pa'o zhes pa'am /
analyzed: sgro ma btags pa'i yul la yod pa'i phyir ro // gang la 'di'i sgro 'dogs pa dper na brten pa'o zhes pa'am /
translated: Because it has an object which exists.üîΩIn regard to what is the superimposition made by this? For example, ‚Äúit is supported‚Äù or ‚Äúit has a self.‚Äù

original: bdag dang bcas ba'o snyam pa'i khyad par de la nges par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: bdag dang bcas ba'o snyam pa'i khyad par de la nges par mi 'gyur te //
translated: That distinction is not ascertained.

original: nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid //
analyzed: nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid //
translated: Because ascertainment and superimposition

original: gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo'i phyir //
analyzed: gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo'i phyir //
translated: are by nature mutually exclusive.

original: dngos po thams cad las tha dad pa mthong yang de kho na bzhin du mngon par shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad las tha dad pa mthong yang de kho na bzhin du mngon par shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Although it is seen as different from all things, it is not a direct perception of thatness.

original: khyad par 'ga' zhig la bar du gcod pa srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par 'ga' zhig la bar du gcod pa srid pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is possible that there is an obstruction to some particular thing.

original: dper na nya phyis kyi dkar po nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nya phyis kyi dkar po nyid lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the whiteness of a shell.

original: gang la rtogs pa po'i 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa de kho na la ni de mthong ba khyad par med kyang 'di'i dran pa nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang la rtogs pa po'i 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa de kho na la ni de mthong ba khyad par med kyang 'di'i dran pa nges par 'gyur te /
translated: But when there is no reason for the error of the cognizer, then even though there is no difference in the seeing of that, there is a definite memory of it.

original: sgro 'dogs pa dang nges pa dag gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩnges pa / 'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pa dang nges pa dag gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro // nges pa / 'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la //
translated: Because superimposition and ascertainment are the nature of what is to be refuted and what refutes.

original: 'jug ces bya bar shes pa yin //
analyzed: 'jug ces bya bar shes pa yin //
translated: Ascertainment is said to be the cognitionüîΩthat engages in the absence of superimposition.

original: des dben ba nyid gzhan sel ba yin no //
analyzed: des dben ba nyid gzhan sel ba yin no //
translated: The absence of that is the exclusion of other.

original: de lta bas na de yang de tsam gyis sel ba'i spyod yul can yin gyi dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo nges par byed ba'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na de yang de tsam gyis sel ba'i spyod yul can yin gyi dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo nges par byed ba'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, that is also the sphere of exclusion by that much, but it is not the nature of ascertaining the intrinsic nature of a thing.

original: de ltar nges pa la yang gzhan ma rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa la yang gzhan ma rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, in that case, one would see the non-apprehension of the other.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo nges pa la ni de mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo nges pa la ni de mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is not possible for the nature of that to be ascertained.

original: cha shas sgro 'dogs ji snyed pa ;
analyzed: cha shas sgro 'dogs ji snyed pa ;
translated: As many as are the parts that are imagined,

original: / de bsal phyir ni nges pa dang // sgra yang de snyed kho na des //
analyzed: / de bsal phyir ni nges pa dang // sgra yang de snyed kho na des //
translated: so many are the ascertainment and the words that remove them.

original: de dag spyod yul tha dad can //
analyzed: de dag spyod yul tha dad can //
translated: They have different spheres of activity.

original: gzhan du dngos po gcig pu la //
analyzed: gzhan du dngos po gcig pu la //
translated: Otherwise, if one thing

original: sgra'am blo gcig gis khyab na //üîΩgzhan yul ma yin de yi phyir //
analyzed: sgra'am blo gcig gis khyab na // gzhan yul ma yin de yi phyir //
translated: were pervaded by one word or idea,üîΩit would not be the object of another.

original: rnam grangs pa ni nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam grangs pa ni nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, it would be a synonym.

original: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses in the middle.

original: gang gi ltar blo khyad par ni //
analyzed: gang gi ltar blo khyad par ni //
translated: According to those who believe that the idea

original: sna tshogs can don tha dad 'dzin //
analyzed: sna tshogs can don tha dad 'dzin //
translated: has a variety of forms and apprehends different objects,

original: gang zhig khyad par rnams ni phan tshun dang rten las tha dad pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig khyad par rnams ni phan tshun dang rten las tha dad pa kho na yin la /
translated: the differences are only different from each other and their basis.

original: de'i rgyu can gyi gnyen po dag ni de dag gi rten nam de dag kho na la 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i rgyu can gyi gnyen po dag ni de dag gi rten nam de dag kho na la 'jug go //
translated: The antidotes that have them as their cause engage only their basis or them.

original: de bas na thal pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa de'i ltar na yang //
analyzed: de bas na thal pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa de'i ltar na yang //
translated: Therefore, the consequence does not hold.

original: khyad par sna tshogs la phan pa'i //
analyzed: khyad par sna tshogs la phan pa'i //
translated: But if you think that the self is the support of the various distinctions,

original: yan lag nus las mi gzhan pa'i //
analyzed: yan lag nus las mi gzhan pa'i //
translated: and that it is not different from the capacity of the parts,

original: bdag nyid bdag nyid kun gzung na //
analyzed: bdag nyid bdag nyid kun gzung na //
translated: and that it is apprehended in all its aspects,

original: phan bya'i bye brag gang ma nges //
analyzed: phan bya'i bye brag gang ma nges //
translated: then what is the particular thing that is not ascertained?

original: khyad par tha dad pa dag kho na don la sgra dang / shes pa gzhan dag gi rgyu mtshan yin du @277a * //
analyzed: khyad par tha dad pa dag kho na don la sgra dang / shes pa gzhan dag gi rgyu mtshan yin du @277a * //
translated: Even though the various distinctions are the causes of the words and cognitions of other things,

original: zin kyang de dang ldan pa gcig pu nyid de ni de dag gis nye bar len to //üîΩkhyad par sna tshogs pa la phan pa'i rten nus pa'i ngo bo nyid de ni bdag nyid la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /üîΩbdag nyid thams cad du gzung na khyad par gyi bye brag ma nges pa gang zhig yod de /
analyzed: zin kyang de dang ldan pa gcig pu nyid de ni de dag gis nye bar len to // khyad par sna tshogs pa la phan pa'i rten nus pa'i ngo bo nyid de ni bdag nyid la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir / bdag nyid thams cad du gzung na khyad par gyi bye brag ma nges pa gang zhig yod de /
translated: only that which possesses them is the object of the words and cognitions.üîΩBut if the support of the various distinctions, which has the nature of capacity, is apprehended in all its aspects,

original: khyad par thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid du gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid du gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then what particular thing is not ascertained, since it is apprehended as that which benefits all the distinctions?

original: rang gi ngo bo gzung ba de'i phan par byed pa nyid ma bzung ba gzhan na ni med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo gzung ba de'i phan par byed pa nyid ma bzung ba gzhan na ni med pa kho na'o //
translated: The benefit that is not grasped as the nature of that is certainly not in another.

original: de'i phyir 'di'i rang gi ngo bor gzung ba gang yin pa de nyid phan par byed pa nyid du yang yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di'i rang gi ngo bor gzung ba gang yin pa de nyid phan par byed pa nyid du yang yin no //
translated: Therefore, whatever is grasped as its nature is also grasped as the benefit.

original: de dag bdag nyid la 'brel phyir //
analyzed: de dag bdag nyid la 'brel phyir //
translated: Because they are related to the self,

original: gcig shes na ni gnyi ga gzung //
analyzed: gcig shes na ni gnyi ga gzung //
translated: when one is known, both are grasped.

original: khyad par de dang ldan pa phan par bya ba dang / phan par byed pa'i ngo bo bdag nyid du gyur pa gzung ba'i phyir gcig shes na gnyi ga gzung bas de khyad par du byas pa gzung na yang khyad par thams cad gzung ba yin te ;
analyzed: khyad par de dang ldan pa phan par bya ba dang / phan par byed pa'i ngo bo bdag nyid du gyur pa gzung ba'i phyir gcig shes na gnyi ga gzung bas de khyad par du byas pa gzung na yang khyad par thams cad gzung ba yin te ;
translated: Because the nature of the object of benefit and the nature of the benefactor are related to the self, when one is known, both are grasped. Therefore, when one grasps the object qualified by that, all the qualifications are grasped.

original: khyad par dang ldan pa 'dzin pa ni de 'dzin pa med na de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par dang ldan pa 'dzin pa ni de 'dzin pa med na de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if the qualified is not grasped, the qualifier is not grasped.

original: gzhan du na de ltar yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de ltar yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be grasped in that way.

original: gzhan la phan par byed pa gang zhig ma bzung bar gyur pa gzhan ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan la phan par byed pa gang zhig ma bzung bar gyur pa gzhan ni med pa nyid do //
translated: There is certainly no other benefit that is not grasped.

original: phan par byed pa de ltar gzung na phan bar bya ba ma bzung ba yang med de ;
analyzed: phan par byed pa de ltar gzung na phan bar bya ba ma bzung ba yang med de ;
translated: If you hold that it is helpful, then there is nothing that is not helpful,

original: de la yang ma bzung bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rje khol bzhin no //
analyzed: de la yang ma bzung bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rje khol bzhin no //
translated: because it would follow that it would not be apprehended, like a master and his servant.

original: de'i phyir khyad par don gzhan yin par smra ba la yang thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par don gzhan yin par smra ba la yang thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs so //
translated: Therefore, even for those who advocate that the qualifier is a different object, the consequence is the same.

original: 'on te gang dag gis khyad par la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa dag ni tha dad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'on te gang dag gis khyad par la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa dag ni tha dad pa kho na ste /
translated: But if you think that the capacities that help the qualifier are different,

original: de'i phyir thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de'i phyir thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
translated: and therefore this consequence does not apply,

original: chos phan nus rnams tha dad na //
analyzed: chos phan nus rnams tha dad na //
translated: then if the capacities that help the property are different,

original: de dag de'i ci yin gal te //
analyzed: de dag de'i ci yin gal te //
translated: what is it that they are of?

original: de las de dag la phan med //
analyzed: de las de dag la phan med //
translated: If they do not help it,

original: de lta yin ni thug med 'gyur //
analyzed: de lta yin ni thug med 'gyur //
translated: then there would be an infinite regress.

original: gal te khyad par re re la phan par byed pa nyid dag yin na ni de'i rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa ngag ma yin pa kho na ste ;
analyzed: gal te khyad par re re la phan par byed pa nyid dag yin na ni de'i rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa ngag ma yin pa kho na ste ;
translated: If each of the capacities that help the qualifier is a qualifier, then it is not the nature of that thing itself,

original: de las phan pa nyams su myong ba yang med na ci ste de'i de dag yin zhes bya /
analyzed: de las phan pa nyams su myong ba yang med na ci ste de'i de dag yin zhes bya /
translated: and if it does not experience help from that, why is it that it is of that?

original: 'on te phan na 'di gcig pus rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i nus pa dag gis nus pa la phan pa byed pa na khyad par gcig gis gzung na yang bdag nyid thams cad du gzung ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'on te phan na 'di gcig pus rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i nus pa dag gis nus pa la phan pa byed pa na khyad par gcig gis gzung na yang bdag nyid thams cad du gzung ba kho na yin te /
translated: But if they are beneficial, then when the capacity to benefit the capacity that is the nature of itself alone is apprehended by one particular, it is only apprehended in all aspects.

original: 'di ltar @277b khyad par gzung na de la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar @277b khyad par gzung na de la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa bzung ba yin no //
translated: In that case, when the particular is apprehended, the capacity to benefit it is apprehended.

original: de gzung na de la phan par byed pa'i dngos po nus pa la phan pa rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa gzung bas thams cad kyi nus pa 'dzin par byed la /
analyzed: de gzung na de la phan par byed pa'i dngos po nus pa la phan pa rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa gzung bas thams cad kyi nus pa 'dzin par byed la /
translated: When that is apprehended, the entity that benefits it, the capacity to benefit, which is endowed with all the capacities that are its nature, is apprehended, and thus all capacities are apprehended.

original: de dag gis kyang khyad par rnam par 'dzin par byed pas thal bar 'gyur pa so na 'dug pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang khyad par rnam par 'dzin par byed pas thal bar 'gyur pa so na 'dug pa yin no //
translated: And since they also apprehend the particular, the consequence is the same.

original: 'on te nus pa la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa de dag kyang dngos po las tha dad pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'on te nus pa la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa de dag kyang dngos po las tha dad pa kho na yin na /
translated: But if the capacities to benefit the capacity to benefit the capacity are only different from the entity,

original: de ltar na khyad par dang de'i nus pa rnams nus pa gzhan dag kho na la mthar thug pa med par sbyor ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de ltar na khyad par dang de'i nus pa rnams nus pa gzhan dag kho na la mthar thug pa med par sbyor ba'i phyir //
translated: Thus, the particularities and their potentialities are connected to other potentialities, without end.

original: de la phan pa'i bdag nyid de gcig pu nam yang de dag dang ma bzung bas de dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la phan pa'i bdag nyid de gcig pu nam yang de dag dang ma bzung bas de dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And since that which is the nature of the benefit of those is never apprehended without them, it is not apprehended as possessing them.

original: yang gal te sgra dang shes pa rnams kyi khyad par bdag nyi tshe la nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: yang gal te sgra dang shes pa rnams kyi khyad par bdag nyi tshe la nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur la /
translated: Now, suppose someone said that the particularities of sound and cognition are connected only to the self.

original: de'i tshe de dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir de rtogs pa'i sgo nas thams cad rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe de dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir de rtogs pa'i sgo nas thams cad rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: At that time, because it would not be related to them, it would not be cognized by the cognition of them.

original: de'i tshe yang sgra dag gis de ma 'phangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang sgra dag gis de ma 'phangs pa'i phyir /
translated: Even at that time, because sound does not impel it,

original: de la sgra mi 'jug pas sgra sbyor ba de med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la sgra mi 'jug pas sgra sbyor ba de med par 'gyur te /
translated: sound would not engage with it. Therefore, the application of sound would not exist.

original: sgrub pa dang dgag pa dag gis tha snyad thams cad ni don byed pa'i rten can yin pas so //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang dgag pa dag gis tha snyad thams cad ni don byed pa'i rten can yin pas so //
translated: This is because all conventions‚Äîaffirmations and negations‚Äîare based on the performance of functions.

original: khyad par rnams kyis ni der mi nus la nus pa ni mi brjod pas sgra sbyor ba dag gis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: khyad par rnams kyis ni der mi nus la nus pa ni mi brjod pas sgra sbyor ba dag gis ci zhig bya /
translated: But since the particulars cannot do that, and since that which can do it is not expressed, what is the use of the words?

original: de'i phyir khyad par rnams ni khyad par yang ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par rnams ni khyad par yang ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore the particulars would not be particulars.

original: 'ga' zhig la zhugs na ni gtso po 'ga'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la zhugs na ni gtso po 'ga'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: If they were engaged in something, they would be the parts of some principal thing.

original: de la ltos nas de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: de la ltos nas de skad ces brjod do //
translated: In dependence on that, they are called that.

original: sgra dag gis de mi 'phen na ni de dag gang gi yang yan lag tu gyur pa ma yin pas ci ste khyad par dag yin /
analyzed: sgra dag gis de mi 'phen na ni de dag gang gi yang yan lag tu gyur pa ma yin pas ci ste khyad par dag yin /
translated: But if the words do not indicate that, then they are not the parts of anything, so why are they particulars?

original: gal te shes par byas pas mtshon pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes par byas pas mtshon pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say there is no fault because they are indicated by the word ‚Äúmade,‚Äù

original: thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs te /
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs te /
translated: then the absurd consequence would be the same.

original: re zhig med na med pa'i phyir khyad par de dag gis de nye bar mtshon pa na gcig gis nye bar mtshon na yang bdag nyid thams cad nye bar mtshon pa yin pas thal bar 'gyur ba son 'dug pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig med na med pa'i phyir khyad par de dag gis de nye bar mtshon pa na gcig gis nye bar mtshon na yang bdag nyid thams cad nye bar mtshon pa yin pas thal bar 'gyur ba son 'dug pa yin no //
translated: If they are not present when it is not present, then when it is indicated by those particulars, even if it is indicated by one, it is indicated in all its aspects, so the absurd consequence would still be the same.

original: 'di sgras nye bar mtshon par byed kyang rung /
analyzed: 'di sgras nye bar mtshon par byed kyang rung /
translated: It may be that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used to illustrate this point.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i khyad par dag gis nye bar mtshon par byed kyang rung ste /
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i khyad par dag gis nye bar mtshon par byed kyang rung ste /
translated: Or it may be that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used to illustrate the distinction.

original: 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod /
translated: What is the difference between these two?

original: @278a * // re zhig de'i tshe de thams cad la phan par byed pa po yin no zhes bya bar nges par byed pas de ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: @278a * // re zhig de'i tshe de thams cad la phan par byed pa po yin no zhes bya bar nges par byed pas de ni gyi na'o //
translated: First, it is certain that at that time, the person is the one who benefits all.üîΩTherefore, the verse says:

original: de'i phyir / gcig la phan byed gzung na ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gcig la phan byed gzung na ni //
translated: If you grasp the one who benefits,

original: de las mthong la ma mthong ba //
analyzed: de las mthong la ma mthong ba //
translated: you do not see the one who is not seen.

original: phan pa gzhan min de yi phyir //
analyzed: phan pa gzhan min de yi phyir //
translated: There is no other benefit than that,

original: de gzung na ni thams cad gzung //
analyzed: de gzung na ni thams cad gzung //
translated: so if you grasp that, you grasp all.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //üîΩgal te 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o // gal te 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
translated: This is the concluding verse.üîΩIf you assert that the object is different

original: gzung ba la yang gzhan 'dod na //
analyzed: gzung ba la yang gzhan 'dod na //
translated: in order to avoid error,

original: gal te 'di snyam du dngos po cha med pa gzung na /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du dngos po cha med pa gzung na /
translated: If you think that if you grasp a partless thing,

original: de'i tshe ma bzung ba gzhan ci zhig yod de /
analyzed: de'i tshe ma bzung ba gzhan ci zhig yod de /
translated: then what other thing is there that is not grasped?

original: de ni 'khrul pas nges par mi 'dzin pas tshad ma gzhan 'jug go snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pas nges par mi 'dzin pas tshad ma gzhan 'jug go snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that because it is not apprehended by error, another valid cognition engages it,

original: gal te de lta na //
analyzed: gal te de lta na //
translated: then in that case,

original: de rnam gcod pa'i yul can grub //
analyzed: de rnam gcod pa'i yul can grub //
translated: it is established as having an object of exclusion.

original: de las gzhan la'ang de dang 'dra //
analyzed: de las gzhan la'ang de dang 'dra //
translated: It is similar to the others as well.

original: sgro 'dogs med pa'i yul la ni //üîΩ'jug phyir / 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir zhugs pa'i tshad ma de ni gzhan sgro 'dogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pas /
analyzed: sgro 'dogs med pa'i yul la ni // 'jug phyir / 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir zhugs pa'i tshad ma de ni gzhan sgro 'dogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pas /
translated: Because it engages an object free from superimposition,üîΩthe valid cognition that engages for the purpose of countering error has the effect of excluding superimposition onto others.

original: gzhan sel pa'i yul can du grub la /
analyzed: gzhan sel pa'i yul can du grub la /
translated: Therefore, it is established as having an object of other-exclusion.

original: gzhan yang de dag 'dra ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang de dag 'dra ste /
translated: Moreover, they are similar because

original: sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: they engage objects free from superimposition.

original: gang la 'di'i sgro 'dogs pa yod pa de la nges pa med pa de'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa med pa la 'jug pa ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'grub bo //
analyzed: gang la 'di'i sgro 'dogs pa yod pa de la nges pa med pa de'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa med pa la 'jug pa ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'grub bo //
translated: Because where there is superimposition by this, there is no ascertainment, therefore engaging without superimposition is established as having an object of other-exclusion.

original: gzhan yang ngo bo gang //
analyzed: gzhan yang ngo bo gang //
translated: Moreover, what is the nature

original: nges pa rnams kyis ma nges pa //
analyzed: nges pa rnams kyis ma nges pa //
translated: of the ascertainment that is not ascertained by the ascertainments?

original: de ni ji ltar de dag yul //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar de dag yul //
translated: How can that be the object of those?

original: nges pa rnams kyis rang gi don rtogs pa ni nges pa gang yin pa 'di kho na yin na /
analyzed: nges pa rnams kyis rang gi don rtogs pa ni nges pa gang yin pa 'di kho na yin na /
translated: The ascertainment of the object by the ascertainment is just this ascertainment.

original: gal te rnam pa gzhan bzhin du ma nges na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa gzhan bzhin du ma nges na /
translated: If it were not ascertained in the same way as the other aspects,

original: ji ltar de dag gis gzung ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag gis gzung ba yin /
translated: how could it be apprehended by them?

original: da ni ji ltar ma nges pa mngon sum gyis kyang gzung ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar ma nges pa mngon sum gyis kyang gzung ba yin zhe na /
translated: Now, how is it that non-ascertainment is apprehended by perception?

original: mngon sum ni gang gi yang nges par byed ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum ni gang gi yang nges par byed ba ma yin te /
translated: Perception does not ascertain anything at all.

original: des gang zhig 'dzin pa de yang nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des gang zhig 'dzin pa de yang nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Whatever it apprehends is not ascertained by it.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: der snang bas so //
analyzed: der snang bas so //
translated: It appears as that.

original: de bas na nges pa dang ma nges ba'i dbang gis mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa dag ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na nges pa dang ma nges ba'i dbang gis mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa dag ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, perception does not apprehend or not apprehend by the power of ascertainment or non-ascertainment.

original: nges pa rnams kyis ni de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa rnams kyis ni de ltar ma yin te /
translated: But it is not so for the ascertainment.

original: 'ga' zhig nges kyang gzhan la ma nges pas 'jug pa tha dad pas 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig nges kyang gzhan la ma nges pas 'jug pa tha dad pas 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Because it engages differently, apprehending some and not others due to ascertainment and non-ascertainment.

original: de'i phyir nges pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that very ascertainment is the apprehension of it.

original: @278b de lta ma yin na rnam pa gcig la yang der mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @278b de lta ma yin na rnam pa gcig la yang der mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then even in the case of a single aspect, there would be no such thing.

original: yang ci'i phyir thams cad pas tha dad pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo la nyams su myong ba skyes kyang de kho na bzhin du dran pa'i nges pa mi 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir thams cad pas tha dad pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo la nyams su myong ba skyes kyang de kho na bzhin du dran pa'i nges pa mi 'byung zhe na /
translated: Again, why is it that, even though the experience of the nature of a thing that is different from everything else has arisen, there is no certainty of recollection just as it was?

original: lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cooperating conditions are incomplete.

original: de bas na //
analyzed: de bas na //
translated: Therefore,

original: khyad par cha shas rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: khyad par cha shas rnam spangs pa //
translated: The aspect of difference is abandoned,

original: mngon sum gyis ni gzung ba'am //üîΩkhyad par gang la rtogs pa yi //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni gzung ba'am // khyad par gang la rtogs pa yi //
translated: and it is apprehended by perception.üîΩThat which is understood

original: rkyen yod de ni rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: rkyen yod de ni rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: in the case of a difference, when the conditions exist, it is understood.

original: thams cad las tha dad pa cha shas dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid nyams su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de tsam gyis khyad par thams cad la nges par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad las tha dad pa cha shas dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid nyams su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de tsam gyis khyad par thams cad la nges par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even though the nature that is different from everything else, which is free from parts, is indeed experienced, still, by that alone, there is no certainty with regard to all the differences,

original: rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it depends on other causes.

original: nyams su myong ba'i rnam par rtog pa la ji ltar goms pa bzhin nges pa'i shes pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i rnam par rtog pa la ji ltar goms pa bzhin nges pa'i shes pa skyed par byed do //
translated: The conceptual thought of experience produces a determinate cognition in accordance with the degree of familiarity.

original: dper na gzugs mthong ba la khyad par med kyang /
analyzed: dper na gzugs mthong ba la khyad par med kyang /
translated: For example, there is no difference in seeing a form,

original: ro myang ba dang / nyal po bya ba dang / bza' bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag lta bu'o //
analyzed: ro myang ba dang / nyal po bya ba dang / bza' bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag lta bu'o //
translated: but there is a difference in the conceptualization of tasting, having sexual intercourse, and eating it.

original: de la ni blo gsal ba dang / 'di bag chags goms pa dang / skabs shes bya ba la sogs pa yang nyams su myong ba las khyad par nges pa skye ba'i lhan cig byed pa dag yin no //
analyzed: de la ni blo gsal ba dang / 'di bag chags goms pa dang / skabs shes bya ba la sogs pa yang nyams su myong ba las khyad par nges pa skye ba'i lhan cig byed pa dag yin no //
translated: In that case, the difference in the ascertainment of the experience arises from the cooperative conditions of the clarity of the mind, the habituation to the latent tendencies, the knowledge of the context, and so on.

original: de dag kho na shin tu nye ba dang / ches shin tu nye ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis snga phyi nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag kho na shin tu nye ba dang / ches shin tu nye ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis snga phyi nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Those very [experiences] become earlier and later due to the distinctions of being very close, extremely close, and so on.

original: dper na skyed par byed pa dang / 'don du 'jug par byed pa nyid du khyad par med kyang pha 'ong ba mthong nas bdag gi pha 'ong ngo snyam gyi mkhan po 'ong ngo snyam pa ni ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na skyed par byed pa dang / 'don du 'jug par byed pa nyid du khyad par med kyang pha 'ong ba mthong nas bdag gi pha 'ong ngo snyam gyi mkhan po 'ong ngo snyam pa ni ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, although there is no difference in being a father and being one who makes one recite, when one sees one's father coming, one thinks my father is coming, but one does not think the preceptor is coming.

original: nges pa der yang 'gyur ba na 'khrul pa'i rgyu med na mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges pa der yang 'gyur ba na 'khrul pa'i rgyu med na mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When that ascertainment occurs, if there is no cause for error, it will not occur.

original: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba kho nas ni rnam pa thams cad ces pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba kho nas ni rnam pa thams cad ces pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that all aspects are only experienced.

original: de la'ang gzhan las ldog pa dang // gzhan las log pa zhes bya yi //üîΩsgra dang nges pa nyid dag ni //
analyzed: de la'ang gzhan las ldog pa dang // gzhan las log pa zhes bya yi // sgra dang nges pa nyid dag ni //
translated: And in that regard, the exclusion is also the other-exclusion.üîΩThe words and the ascertainment

original: brda yi rjes su byed pa yin //
analyzed: brda yi rjes su byed pa yin //
translated: are in accord with the convention.

original: gzhan sel ba de la yang ldog pa yang gzhan log pa yang rgyu gzhan pa nyid med de /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba de la yang ldog pa yang gzhan log pa yang rgyu gzhan pa nyid med de /
translated: In that other-exclusion, the exclusion is not another cause of the other-exclusion,

original: de las ldog pa las log pa la de yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ldog pa las log pa la de yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the exclusion would exist in the other-exclusion.

original: de lta yin na ni ldog pa yang med do //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni ldog pa yang med do //
translated: If that were so, then there would be no exclusion.

original: de'i phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de nyid log pa yin no //
