analyzed: de'i phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de nyid log pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which is the exclusion is itself the other-exclusion.

original: sgra dang rtogs pa'i tha dad pa ni brda'i bye brag gis yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra dang rtogs pa'i tha dad pa ni brda'i bye brag gis yin gyi /
translated: The difference between the word and the understanding is due to the difference in the convention.

original: brjod par bya ba la ni tha dad pa med do //üîΩbrjod par @279a * //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba la ni tha dad pa med do // brjod par @279a * //
translated: There is no difference in the object of expression.üîΩIf there were no difference in the object of expression,

original: bya ba tha dad pa med pa'i phyir brda'i bye brag kyang mi rung ste /
analyzed: bya ba tha dad pa med pa'i phyir brda'i bye brag kyang mi rung ste /
translated: then the difference in the convention would also be impossible,

original: gnyi gas gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi gas gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both would express the same thing.

original: de ltar na tha dad par 'byed pa'i rnam pa dbye ba yang mi sbyar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na tha dad par 'byed pa'i rnam pa dbye ba yang mi sbyar bar 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the distinction of the different aspects would not be applied.

original: de ni tha dad pa la brten pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni tha dad pa la brten pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because that is based on difference.

original: gnyi gas gcig cig brjod mod kyi //üîΩbrjod bya'i shan gyi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: gnyi gas gcig cig brjod mod kyi // brjod bya'i shan gyi khyad par gyis //
translated: Both express one thing,üîΩbut because of the difference in what is expressed,

original: rnam dbye tha dad 'byed pa yis //
analyzed: rnam dbye tha dad 'byed pa yis //
translated: the distinction of the different cases

original: tha dad don bzhin sgrub par byed //
analyzed: tha dad don bzhin sgrub par byed //
translated: is established as if it were a different meaning.

original: sgra rnams kyi 'jug pa yul gyi rang gi ngo bo la rag las pa ni 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: sgra rnams kyi 'jug pa yul gyi rang gi ngo bo la rag las pa ni 'ga' yang med de /
translated: There is no engagement of words that is dependent on the intrinsic nature of the object,

original: 'dod pas 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pas 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that there would be no engagement through desire.

original: de dag tha dad pa'am tha dad pa ma yin pa la ji ltar sbyar bar 'dod pa de ltar sbyar ba ni don de gegs byed pa med par rab tu ston par byed do //
analyzed: de dag tha dad pa'am tha dad pa ma yin pa la ji ltar sbyar bar 'dod pa de ltar sbyar ba ni don de gegs byed pa med par rab tu ston par byed do //
translated: Whether they are applied to difference or non-difference, they are applied as desired, and thus they clearly show that object without obstruction.

original: de'i phyir ba lang dang ba lang nyid ces bya bas don gcig brjod mod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir ba lang dang ba lang nyid ces bya bas don gcig brjod mod kyi /
translated: Therefore, although ‚Äúcow‚Äù and ‚Äúcow-ness‚Äù express the same meaning,

original: khyad par 'ga' zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par 'ga' zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to make known a certain distinction,

original: brdas khyad par byas na don gzhan ma yin kyang tha dad pa'i don can gyi rnam par dbye bas don tha dad pa lta bur ston par snang ste /
analyzed: brdas khyad par byas na don gzhan ma yin kyang tha dad pa'i don can gyi rnam par dbye bas don tha dad pa lta bur ston par snang ste /
translated: Although the meaning is not different when distinguished by the sign, it appears to show a different meaning by the division of different aspects.

original: de ltar sbyor ba mthong ba la goms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba mthong ba la goms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because one is accustomed to seeing the application in that way.

original: de tsam gyis thams cad la tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de tsam gyis thams cad la tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: However, not everything is different by that much alone.

original: gzhan la yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa la gags byed pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan la yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa la gags byed pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: This is because there is no obstruction to engaging in other things by the power of the desire of the person.

original: dper na gcig la 'ga' zhig tu gcig gi tshig gis sgro 'dogs la /üîΩder khyad par med kyang gus pa la sogs pa brjod ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na gcig la 'ga' zhig tu gcig gi tshig gis sgro 'dogs la / der khyad par med kyang gus pa la sogs pa brjod ba'i phyir /
translated: For example, in regard to one thing, in some cases the word ‚Äúone‚Äù is applied,

original: mang po'i tshig gis sgro 'dogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mang po'i tshig gis sgro 'dogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: and in that case, although there is no difference, the word ‚Äúmany‚Äù is applied in order to express respect and so on.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir brda tha dad par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir brda tha dad par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that a different sign does not occur because there is no need,

original: de yang yod pa kho na ste 'di ltar /üîΩkhyad par gzhan ni spong ba dang // mi spong ba dag de gnyis kyi //
analyzed: de yang yod pa kho na ste 'di ltar / khyad par gzhan ni spong ba dang // mi spong ba dag de gnyis kyi //
translated: that also exists, becauseüîΩthe sign is distinguished by the two:

original: brda yi bye brag rtogs pa po'i //
analyzed: brda yi bye brag rtogs pa po'i //
translated: the exclusion of other differences and the nonexclusion of other differences.üîΩThe one who understands the difference between the two

original: 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i gzhi //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i gzhi //
translated: The basis for the activity of desire.

original: gang gi tshe rtogs par byed pa 'di de las gzhan rnam par bcad pa yod pa la mi ltos par gong du khyad par la rta rnam par bcad pa tsam shes par 'dod pa na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rtogs par byed pa 'di de las gzhan rnam par bcad pa yod pa la mi ltos par gong du khyad par la rta rnam par bcad pa tsam shes par 'dod pa na /
translated: When one wishes to know the mere exclusion of horse in the particular, without depending on the existence of the exclusion of that from others,

original: de lta bu shes par bya ba'i phyir de ltar brdar byas pa'i sgras 'di la rta ma yin pa nyid yod do zhes bya bar rab tu shes par byed do //
analyzed: de lta bu shes par bya ba'i phyir de ltar brdar byas pa'i sgras 'di la rta ma yin pa nyid yod do zhes bya bar rab tu shes par byed do //
translated: in order to know that, the word that is used in that way makes one understand that this has the nature of non-horse.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par bcad pa gzhan gyis mi 'dod pa med par de shes par 'dod pa de'i @279b tshe ni de ltar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩrnam pa gzhan pa gzhan yongs su ma spangs pa la 'di ni rta ma yin pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par bcad pa gzhan gyis mi 'dod pa med par de shes par 'dod pa de'i @279b tshe ni de ltar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir / rnam pa gzhan pa gzhan yongs su ma spangs pa la 'di ni rta ma yin pa yin no //
translated: When one wishes to know that without the exclusion of what is not desired by others, then in order to teach that in that way,

original: zhes rab tu sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhes rab tu sbyor ro //
translated: in the case of the exclusion of what is not that, which is not completely abandoned, one applies it by saying, ‚ÄúThis is a non-horse.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma la ni sgra 'jug pa khyad par gzhan spangs pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma la ni sgra 'jug pa khyad par gzhan spangs pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, in the former case, the application of the word is due to the exclusion of other particulars, and there is a common locus.

original: khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi dngos po ma yin te /
translated: The specific property and the substratum of the specific property are not real entities.

original: 'di'i ba lang nyid dkar po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ba lang nyid dkar po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, ‚Äúthe cowness of a white cow.‚Äù

original: de tsam gyi khyad par gyis blo de'i rten du gyur pa gcig pa nyid du mi snang ba'i phyir dang / 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam gyi khyad par gyis blo de'i rten du gyur pa gcig pa nyid du mi snang ba'i phyir dang / 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the first case, there is no such appearance of oneness as the basis of the cognition, because there is no desire for such a specific property.

original: gnyis pa la ni yod de de lta bu'i brda'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni yod de de lta bu'i brda'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir /
translated: In the second case, there is, because one follows the convention in that way.

original: rnam par bcad pa'i chos mtha' dag bsdus pas rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa gcig lta bur ston par snang ba'i phyir dang / rnam par bcad pa gzhan 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //üîΩkun la rdzas dang dngos brjod pa'i //
analyzed: rnam par bcad pa'i chos mtha' dag bsdus pas rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa gcig lta bur ston par snang ba'i phyir dang / rnam par bcad pa gzhan 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro // kun la rdzas dang dngos brjod pa'i //
translated: For example, it appears as if one were to show a single thing possessing a distinction by including all the eliminated things, and because one desires another elimination.üîΩThis very distinction of words

original: sgra yi khyad par 'di nyid de //üîΩde'i phyir de dag brjod bya la //
analyzed: sgra yi khyad par 'di nyid de // de'i phyir de dag brjod bya la //
translated: that express substance and entity in all cases,üîΩtherefore, there is no distinction at all

original: khyad par 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: khyad par 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
translated: in what is expressed by those.

original: de lta bas na thams cad du chos dang chos can brjod pa'i sgra dag gis brjod par bya ba'i don la nges pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid du khyad par 'ga' yang med de /üîΩgcig gis ni de nyid shes par byed pa la khyad par gzhan spangs te shes par byed pa la /
analyzed: de lta bas na thams cad du chos dang chos can brjod pa'i sgra dag gis brjod par bya ba'i don la nges pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid du khyad par 'ga' yang med de / gcig gis ni de nyid shes par byed pa la khyad par gzhan spangs te shes par byed pa la /
translated: Therefore, in every case, there is no difference at all between the words that express the property and the property-possessor, in terms of being the object of a certain ascertaining consciousness that is the meaning of what is expressed.

original: gzhan gyis ni ma spangs te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma spangs te /
translated: One makes known that very object by abandoning other differences, and the other does not abandon it.

original: shes par byed pas khyad par ni de yod do //
analyzed: shes par byed pas khyad par ni de yod do //
translated: The difference is that one makes it known.

original: don de shes par byed 'dod pas //
analyzed: don de shes par byed 'dod pas //
translated: One who wishes to make known that object

original: de la phan pa'am byed ldan pa'am //
analyzed: de la phan pa'am byed ldan pa'am //
translated: should teach it by means of what is beneficial, or what is related to it,

original: gal te gzhan gyis brjod kyang rung //
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyis brjod kyang rung //
translated: or else, if it is expressed by another,

original: de las khyad par gzhan med do //
analyzed: de las khyad par gzhan med do //
translated: there is no difference from that.

original: khyad par de tsam kho na ston par byed pa na de lta bu'i shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //üîΩbrtsed pa nyid ces de la phan pas ston kyang rung /
analyzed: khyad par de tsam kho na ston par byed pa na de lta bu'i shes par bya ba'i phyir ro // brtsed pa nyid ces de la phan pas ston kyang rung /
translated: When one teaches just that much difference, it is in order to make known that kind of object.üîΩOne may teach it by means of what is beneficial to it,

original: brtsed pa zhes byed pa dang ldan pas kyang rung /
analyzed: brtsed pa zhes byed pa dang ldan pas kyang rung /
translated: or by means of what is related to it,

original: rang gis byas pa'i gzhung lugs gzhan gyis kyang rung /
analyzed: rang gis byas pa'i gzhung lugs gzhan gyis kyang rung /
translated: or else, by means of another‚Äôs treatise that one has composed oneself.

original: de skad du brjod pa tsam gyis ni de don gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de skad du brjod pa tsam gyis ni de don gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: But by merely saying this, it becomes a different object,

original: de lta bu kho na shes par bya ba'i phyir sgra brdar byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu kho na shes par bya ba'i phyir sgra brdar byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word is used to indicate just that.

original: brtsed pa nyid ces bya ba 'brel pa la bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: brtsed pa nyid ces bya ba 'brel pa la bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the term ‚Äúcook‚Äù used in the sense of a relation?

original: 'tshed pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'tshed pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not used in the sense of cooking.

original: ji skad du brjod pa lta bur 'tshed pa dang / 'tshed pa po gzhan 'ga' kho na zhig brjod pa ni ma yin no //üîΩ'di'i @280a * //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa lta bur 'tshed pa dang / 'tshed pa po gzhan 'ga' kho na zhig brjod pa ni ma yin no // 'di'i @280a * //
translated: It is not that the word ‚Äúcook‚Äù is used to refer to some other person who is cooking or who is not cooking.üîΩWhat is to be said

original: brjod par bya ba gang yin pa de ni bstan zin to //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba gang yin pa de ni bstan zin to //
translated: has already been said.

original: de nyid 'tshed pas kyang brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid 'tshed pas kyang brjod do //
translated: It is also said that he is cooking.

original: gting mi tshugs pa log pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis chog go //
analyzed: gting mi tshugs pa log pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis chog go //
translated: Enough of this pointless speculation!

original: ji ltar bya ba don gzhan du gyur pa 'am /
analyzed: ji ltar bya ba don gzhan du gyur pa 'am /
translated: How the action is different from the object,

original: de dag gi 'du ba ma yin pa de ni 'og nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi 'du ba ma yin pa de ni 'og nas shes par bya'o //
translated: and how it is not a collection of those, will be understood later.

original: de phyir gzhan sel yul la ni //
analyzed: de phyir gzhan sel yul la ni //
translated: Therefore, in the domain of other-exclusion,

original: de ldan phyogs la brjod pa bsal //
analyzed: de ldan phyogs la brjod pa bsal //
translated: the expression is removed from the position that possesses it.

original: rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag / tha dad nyid na nyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag / tha dad nyid na nyes par 'gyur //
translated: If the universal and the possessor of the universal were different, there would be a fault.

original: sgra'i don gzhan sel ba can la yang des khyad par du byas pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra'i don gzhan sel ba can la yang des khyad par du byas pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In the case of the meaning of a word as the exclusion of another, since it is described as qualified by that,

original: de dang ldan pa'i phyogs la brjod pa'i thal ba thams cad mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i phyogs la brjod pa'i thal ba thams cad mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: all the consequences of the description of the possessor of that would be the same.

original: zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang 'dis bsal te /
analyzed: zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang 'dis bsal te /
translated: This also refutes what was said above.

original: de la ni don gzhan la brten nas 'jug pa'i sgra rang dbang med pa la sogs pa'i nyes pas gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la ni don gzhan la brten nas 'jug pa'i sgra rang dbang med pa la sogs pa'i nyes pas gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the word that operates in dependence on another object is undermined by the fault of lack of independence, and so on.

original: gzhan las ldog pa ni log pa las don gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa ni log pa las don gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The exclusion of another is not a different object from the negation,

original: gnyi gas gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //üîΩda ni log pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'gro ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyi gas gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to // da ni log pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'gro ba'i phyir /
translated: because it has been explained that both express the same thing.

original: ji ltar gzhan las ldog pa spyi yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan las ldog pa spyi yin zhe na /
translated: Now, how can the exclusion of another be a universal, since it does not pervade the other?

original: de'i blo la de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i blo la de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cognition of that appears in that way.

original: spyi zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
translated: There is no such thing as a universal at all.

original: sgra'i rten can gyi blo thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthus chos ma 'dres pa dag kyang bsre zhing skye'o //
analyzed: sgra'i rten can gyi blo thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthus chos ma 'dres pa dag kyang bsre zhing skye'o //
translated: The cognition that is based on sound arises from the power of beginningless latent potentialities, and it mixes and arises with regard to unmixed phenomena.

original: don med bzhin du yang de snang ba'i dbang gis spyi dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: don med bzhin du yang de snang ba'i dbang gis spyi dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: Although it is meaningless, it is posited as a universal and as a common locus by the power of its appearance.

original: don rnams la 'brel pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don rnams la 'brel pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no relation or difference among objects.

original: de thams cad kyi rten ni de'i 'bras bu dang rgyu can nyid kyis gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i don rnams yin la /
analyzed: de thams cad kyi rten ni de'i 'bras bu dang rgyu can nyid kyis gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i don rnams yin la /
translated: The basis of all of that is objects that are different from others because they are the cause and effect of that.

original: sgras kyang mi 'dod pa spangs te 'jug par byed pa gzhan sel ba'i yul can du bshad de /
analyzed: sgras kyang mi 'dod pa spangs te 'jug par byed pa gzhan sel ba'i yul can du bshad de /
translated: Sound is explained to be a subject that is an object of other-exclusion, which is engaged in after rejecting what is not wanted.

original: de la phyi rol gyi don gyi de kho na nyid la mi ltos pa blo snang ba'i dbang gis gcig pu du ma las log pa sgra rnams dang / de nyams su myong ba'i bag chags sad pa las skye ba can gyi rnam par rtog pa de'i dngos po nges pa'i don can rnams kyi yul du byed cing de nyid la chos dang chos can gyi tha snyad phan tshun de nyid dang gzhan dag tu brjod par
analyzed: de la phyi rol gyi don gyi de kho na nyid la mi ltos pa blo snang ba'i dbang gis gcig pu du ma las log pa sgra rnams dang / de nyams su myong ba'i bag chags sad pa las skye ba can gyi rnam par rtog pa de'i dngos po nges pa'i don can rnams kyi yul du byed cing de nyid la chos dang chos can gyi tha snyad phan tshun de nyid dang gzhan dag tu brjod par
translated: In this regard, the object of those words that are the opposite of one and many, which are not dependent on the reality of external objects, but are the domain of the power of the appearance of cognition, and the object of those words that have the meaning of ascertaining the entity of the conception that arises from the arousing of the latent potentialities of the experience of that, are not to be expressed as either the same or different.

original: bya ba ma yin pa 'di @280b spro bar byed do //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pa 'di @280b spro bar byed do //
translated: This is what is to be elaborated.

original: chos ni chos can las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: chos ni chos can las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The property is not different from the property-possessor,

original: don gzhan mi brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan mi brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not express a different object.

original: de nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the same,

original: de brjod pa dag bzhin du chos brjod pa rnams kyis kyang rnam par gcod pa gzhan 'phen par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de brjod pa dag bzhin du chos brjod pa rnams kyis kyang rnam par gcod pa gzhan 'phen par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because, like the expressions of that, the expressions of the property would also entail the projection of a different exclusion.

original: de lta na ni 'dod pa'i shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir brda'i khyad par mi bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'dod pa'i shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir brda'i khyad par mi bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then because it would not be a cognition of the desire realm, one would not make a distinction in the conventions.

original: chos dang chos can dag brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid 'di ni sgra'i don la yin no //
analyzed: chos dang chos can dag brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid 'di ni sgra'i don la yin no //
translated: This inexpressibility of the property and the property-possessor is in regard to the meaning of the word.

original: dngos po la ni rang gi mtshan nyid las spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin te med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po la ni rang gi mtshan nyid las spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin te med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In reality, the universal is not expressible apart from the particular, because it does not exist.

original: chos dang chos can dag tha dad pa ma yin na /
analyzed: chos dang chos can dag tha dad pa ma yin na /
translated: If the property and the property-possessor are not different,

original: tha dad pa la drug pa la sogs par rnam par dbye ba mthong ba dang / chos mang ba'i phyir de la mang po'i tshig gi bye brag mthong ba yang chos can gcig la mi rung ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa la drug pa la sogs par rnam par dbye ba mthong ba dang / chos mang ba'i phyir de la mang po'i tshig gi bye brag mthong ba yang chos can gcig la mi rung ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: then since difference is seen in the six categories and so on, and since the word for multiplicity is seen in the many properties, is it not the case that this is not possible for a single property-possessor?

original: 'di la sgra rnams la rang dbang can nyid ni med do zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di la sgra rnams la rang dbang can nyid ni med do zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Here it has already been explained that words are not independent.üîΩMoreover,üîΩThose whose words are not dependent

original: gzhan yang / gang dag gi tshig dngos po'i dbang //üîΩlhur brjod 'dod la mi brten pa //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gang dag gi tshig dngos po'i dbang //üîΩlhur brjod 'dod la mi brten pa //
translated: On the force of things,

original: de dag la ni drug pa dang // tshig dbye la sogs klan ka rigs //
analyzed: de dag la ni drug pa dang // tshig dbye la sogs klan ka rigs //
translated: that they are the sixth case, or that they are inflected words, and so on.

original: gal te sgra 'di dag skyes bu rnams kyis 'ga' zhig la bya bar 'dod du zin kyang du ba la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po dang 'brel pa'i phyir bya bar mi nus na de'i tshe ji ltar drug pa la sogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te sgra 'di dag skyes bu rnams kyis 'ga' zhig la bya bar 'dod du zin kyang du ba la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po dang 'brel pa'i phyir bya bar mi nus na de'i tshe ji ltar drug pa la sogs par 'gyur /
translated: Even if these words are asserted by people to be used for something, if they cannot be used because they are related to things like smoke, then how could they be the sixth case, and so on?

original: zhes bya ba'i klan ka 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i klan ka 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: This is the objection that arises.

original: gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe /
translated: But when

original: phyi rol don la mi ltos pa'i //üîΩtshig gang smra bos ji lta bur //
analyzed: phyi rol don la mi ltos pa'i // tshig gang smra bos ji lta bur //
translated: words that do not depend on external objectsüîΩare ascertained by speakers

original: rjod byed nyid du nges byed pa //
analyzed: rjod byed nyid du nges byed pa //
translated: as being the means of expression,

original: de de bzhin du rjod byed yin //
analyzed: de de bzhin du rjod byed yin //
translated: they are the means of expression in that way.

original: tha dad pa la ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa la ni drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth case is for different things.

original: mang po la ni byed pa po rnams so //
analyzed: mang po la ni byed pa po rnams so //
translated: The agentive case is for many agents.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa la mi ltos pa nyid du dngos po nye ba tsam gyis rang nyid zhugs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa la mi ltos pa nyid du dngos po nye ba tsam gyis rang nyid zhugs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: And so on. But they are not engaged by themselves merely through the presence of things, without depending on the desire of a person.

original: de dag ni de la de ltar sbyor bas de ltar go par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag ni de la de ltar sbyor bas de ltar go par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are understood in that way through applying them in that way.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la la yang de dag gis ji ltar yang rung rab tu sbyar ba de kho na bzhin du go ba'i rgyu dag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la la yang de dag gis ji ltar yang rung rab tu sbyar ba de kho na bzhin du go ba'i rgyu dag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, other words are causes of understanding in accordance with how they are used.

original: de la ni brjod par bya ba dag skyes bu la rag las te /üîΩ'jug pa'i sgra dngos po yang dag par mi ston pa ji ltar goms pa bzhin rnam par rtog @281a * //
analyzed: de la ni brjod par bya ba dag skyes bu la rag las te / 'jug pa'i sgra dngos po yang dag par mi ston pa ji ltar goms pa bzhin rnam par rtog @281a * //
translated: In this case, the things to be expressed depend on the person.üîΩThe words that are used do not indicate the thing correctly, but are causes of the awakening of the conception in accordance with the habit.

original: pa sad pa'i rgyur gyur pa rnams 'jug pa sems pa dang / de'i dbang gis dngos po rnam par 'jog pa ni blun par ston pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: pa sad pa'i rgyur gyur pa rnams 'jug pa sems pa dang / de'i dbang gis dngos po rnam par 'jog pa ni blun par ston pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: The use of the words is the mere thought of the thing, and the establishment of the thing by the power of that is the mere teaching of the fool.

original: chos dang chos can la sogs pa la sgra dag de ltar rnam par gzhag par byas kyi /
analyzed: chos dang chos can la sogs pa la sgra dag de ltar rnam par gzhag par byas kyi /
translated: The words are established in that way with regard to the property and the subject, etc.üîΩBut not by way of the difference of the exclusion and the thing.

original: ldog pa dang dngos po tha dad pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: ldog pa dang dngos po tha dad pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
translated: Where is this known?

original: de ltar na tha snyad mi rung ba'i phyir te /üîΩchos dang chos can dag tha dad pa'am /
analyzed: de ltar na tha snyad mi rung ba'i phyir te / chos dang chos can dag tha dad pa'am /
translated: Because the convention is not possible in that way.üîΩThe property and the subject are different,üîΩor they are of the same nature,

original: de'i ngo bo yin pa'am /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo yin pa'am /
translated: It is the essence of that.üîΩüîΩ

original: sgra rnams dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra rnams dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The word is applied to the thing as it is.

original: spyi dang de dag gi 'brel pa dang / gzhi mthun pa nyid dang / khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po dag mi rung ngo zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi dang de dag gi 'brel pa dang / gzhi mthun pa nyid dang / khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po dag mi rung ngo zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: We will explain that the universal, the relation of the universal to the particulars, the common locus, the qualifier and the qualified are impossible.

original: gang yang sgra 'jug pa'i khyad par 'di ni thams cad du dngos pos byas pa kho nar 'dod pa de'i /
analyzed: gang yang sgra 'jug pa'i khyad par 'di ni thams cad du dngos pos byas pa kho nar 'dod pa de'i /
translated: As for the distinction in the application of the word, you maintain that it is always produced by the thing.

original: btsun mo rnams grong drug la sogs //
analyzed: btsun mo rnams grong drug la sogs //
translated: What is the reason for the expression ‚Äúthe queens of the six towns,‚Äù

original: tha dad tha dad min gzhan pa'am //üîΩnam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkha' nyid //
analyzed: tha dad tha dad min gzhan pa'am // nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkha' nyid //
translated: ‚Äúthe other, different, nondifferent,‚Äù

original: ces bya ba 'di la rgyu ci yod /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di la rgyu ci yod /
translated: ‚Äúspace itself, which is the nature of space‚Äù?

original: gang gi tshe bud med gcig la yang btsun mo rnams zhes bya ba dang / bye ma gcig la yang bye ma rnams zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de la gang gis na de lta bur 'gyur ba'i mang po nyid ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bud med gcig la yang btsun mo rnams zhes bya ba dang / bye ma gcig la yang bye ma rnams zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de la gang gis na de lta bur 'gyur ba'i mang po nyid ci zhig yod /
translated: When one woman is called ‚Äúthe queens,‚Äù and one grain of sand is called ‚Äúthe sands,‚Äù what is the plurality that would make them so?

original: gal te nus pa tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nus pa tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the difference in their power,

original: de ni thams cad du gcig gis tshig nyams pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni thams cad du gcig gis tshig nyams pa yin te /
translated: It is a downfall to speak in any way of the faults of a fellow monk.üîΩ

original: nus pa gcig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa gcig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In all cases, the singular number is used because there is no single entity that has the power to produce the effect.

original: 'bad pa yang don med do //
analyzed: 'bad pa yang don med do //
translated: And the effort is useless.

original: gal te dngos po tha mi dad pa'i phyir gzhan la gcig gi tshig tu 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po tha mi dad pa'i phyir gzhan la gcig gi tshig tu 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the singular number is used for another because the entity is not different,

original: 'di la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: then this is also the case.

original: de'i phyir nges pa dngos po ma yin pa 'di byed pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa dngos po ma yin pa 'di byed pa na /
translated: Therefore, when you make this rule that the singular number is not based on an entity,

original: sgra sbyor ba la 'dod pa rang dbang can du ston pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra sbyor ba la 'dod pa rang dbang can du ston pa yin no //
translated: you are showing that the use of words is independent of what is desired.

original: grong khyer drug ces bya ba yang ji ltar mang po dag la gcig gi tshig tu 'gyur /
analyzed: grong khyer drug ces bya ba yang ji ltar mang po dag la gcig gi tshig tu 'gyur /
translated: And how is it that the expression ‚Äúsix cities‚Äù is used for many cities?

original: grong khyer nyid kyang cung zad kyang med na /
analyzed: grong khyer nyid kyang cung zad kyang med na /
translated: And if there is not even a city,

original: de rnams la sdud pa lta gal yod /
analyzed: de rnams la sdud pa lta gal yod /
translated: how much less so a collection of them?

original: khang bzangs dang skyes bu la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa rnams kyis mi rtsom pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khang bzangs dang skyes bu la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa rnams kyis mi rtsom pa'i phyir /
translated: Because houses, people, etc. are not composed of different kinds.

original: de rnams kyi spyi lta zhig rdzas gang la yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi spyi lta zhig rdzas gang la yin te /
translated: And what substance is there in the universal of those?

original: ldan pa med pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: ldan pa med pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no inherence.

original: ldan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ldan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: There is no inherence.

original: khang bzangs rang nyid ldan pa'i bdag nyid @281b yin pa gzhan dang mi ldan pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: khang bzangs rang nyid ldan pa'i bdag nyid @281b yin pa gzhan dang mi ldan pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: and it is the self that possesses the house, not the other way around.

original: de nyid kyi phyir grangs kyang med de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir grangs kyang med de /
translated: For this same reason, there is no number.

original: gal te gong khyer ni ldan pa de dang skyes bus khyad par du byas pa'i yod pa yin no zhen /
analyzed: gal te gong khyer ni ldan pa de dang skyes bus khyad par du byas pa'i yod pa yin no zhen /
translated: If you say that the city is the existence qualified by the person who possesses it,

original: bogs dbyung du med pa 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod /
analyzed: bogs dbyung du med pa 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod /
translated: what is the difference between this and the existence that cannot be improved?

original: yod pa yang gcig yin pa'i phyir /üîΩgrong khyer mang po nyid la yang grong khyer rnams zhes mang po'i tshig tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod pa yang gcig yin pa'i phyir / grong khyer mang po nyid la yang grong khyer rnams zhes mang po'i tshig tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And because existence is one,üîΩthe word ‚Äúcities‚Äù would not be a plural.

original: gal te gnyis phan tshun grogs byed pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gnyis phan tshun grogs byed pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that two things are a city because they are mutual assistants,

original: phan par bya ba dang phan par byed pa po ma yin pa dag la grogs byed pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod /
analyzed: phan par bya ba dang phan par byed pa po ma yin pa dag la grogs byed pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod /
translated: what is the nature of the assistance between that which is assisted and that which assists?

original: skyes bu dang ldan pa dang / yod pa rnams kyang mang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: skyes bu dang ldan pa dang / yod pa rnams kyang mang ba'i phyir /
translated: And because the person and the existences are many,

original: ji ltar grong khyer zhes gcig gi tshig tu 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar grong khyer zhes gcig gi tshig tu 'gyur /
translated: how could the word ‚Äúcity‚Äù be a singular?

original: gal te de lta bu rnams don 'ga' zhig la nus pa tha mi dad pa yod pas de rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta bu rnams don 'ga' zhig la nus pa tha mi dad pa yod pas de rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that they are not different in their capacity for some purpose, that is the reason.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: nus pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩbam po gsum pa /
analyzed: nus pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // bam po gsum pa /
translated: because capacity is not different from the nature of the thing.

original: 'on te tha dad na ni phan par bya ba ma yin pa la gzhan gyi dbang mi rung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'on te tha dad na ni phan par bya ba ma yin pa la gzhan gyi dbang mi rung ba'i phyir //
translated: But if it is different, then it is not tenable that the dependent is not helpful,

original: 'on te phan na ni nus pa la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pas thug pa med pa'i phyir rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: 'on te phan na ni nus pa la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pas thug pa med pa'i phyir rtogs pa med do //
translated: because if it is helpful, then there is an infinite regress of capacities that are helpful to capacities.

original: 'on te de dang tha mi dang po la yang thal bar 'gyur bas da ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: 'on te de dang tha mi dang po la yang thal bar 'gyur bas da ni gyi na'o //
translated: But if it is not different, then the same consequence applies to the first one.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkha' nyid ces bya ba tha dad pa'i rten gyi drug par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkha' nyid ces bya ba tha dad pa'i rten gyi drug par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And if the nature of space is space itself, then the genitive case would not be used,

original: de la spyi ni med do //
analyzed: de la spyi ni med do //
translated: because there is no universal there.

original: khyab pa nyid la sogs pa yon tan rnams la de skad du brjod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyab pa nyid la sogs pa yon tan rnams la de skad du brjod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not said that the qualities such as pervasiveness are in that.

original: don gzhan pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir dang / de dag kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir dang / de dag kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not tenable that something else is the intrinsic reality of that, and because it follows that they would be essenceless.

original: de yang rang bzhin don gzhan pa can yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin don gzhan pa can yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if it has an intrinsic reality that is something else, there is the fault of infinite regress.

original: de lta na yang rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: de lta na yang rtogs pa med do //
translated: But even so, there is no understanding.

original: de bzhin du dngos po drug gi tshogs la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po drug gi tshogs la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: So too, it should be stated in the same way with regard to the collection of the six substances and so on.

original: de la spyi dang grangs dang ldan pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: de la spyi dang grangs dang ldan pa ni mi srid do //
translated: Therein, the universal, number, and possessor are impossible.

original: da ni khyad par med na ji ltar nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes bya'i /
analyzed: da ni khyad par med na ji ltar nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes bya'i /
translated: Now, if there is no distinction, why is it called the intrinsic reality of space,

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba kho na ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba kho na ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: and not just space?

original: nam mkha'i don gzhan dang thun mong ba'i ngo bo la mi ltos par nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo la de lta bur shes par 'dod pa de skad du brjod do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i don gzhan dang thun mong ba'i ngo bo la mi ltos par nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo la de lta bur shes par 'dod pa de skad du brjod do //
translated: The term ‚Äúspace‚Äù is applied as the cause of the desire to know it in that way, without depending on the nature that is shared in common with other objects of space.

original: thams cad @282a * //
analyzed: thams cad @282a * //
translated: Everything

original: las sog pa'i rang gi ngo bo brjod par mi srid ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: las sog pa'i rang gi ngo bo brjod par mi srid ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it impossible to express the nature of the accumulation of karma?

original: ngo bo nyid de blo la 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid de blo la 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the nature itself is posited for the mind.

original: dbang pos mi sod pa nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: dbang pos mi sod pa nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
translated: Because it would follow that it would not be imperceptible by the sense faculties.

original: 'di ni de lta bu shes par bya'o snyam nas sgras nyan pa po la rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan de'i rang gi ngo bo dang ma 'brel pa gtod par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
analyzed: 'di ni de lta bu shes par bya'o snyam nas sgras nyan pa po la rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan de'i rang gi ngo bo dang ma 'brel pa gtod par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
translated: It is only the speaker who, thinking ‚ÄúThis is to be known in this way,‚Äù causes the listener to apprehend the mere image of the concept of that nature, which is not connected with the nature itself.

original: 'di ltar don ma mthong ba la ni don gyi rnam par rtog pa tsam mo zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar don ma mthong ba la ni don gyi rnam par rtog pa tsam mo zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: Thus, it is explained that when the object is not seen, it is merely a concept of the object.

original: de ltar na rtogs par bya ba dang / rtogs par byed pa dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang / bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na rtogs par bya ba dang / rtogs par byed pa dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang / bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the object to be understood and the means of understanding do not understand the intrinsic identity, nor is it taught.

original: mtho ris la sogs pa thos pa la yang de nyams su myong ba dag dang 'dra bar snang ba tha dad pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtho ris la sogs pa thos pa la yang de nyams su myong ba dag dang 'dra bar snang ba tha dad pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that even hearing about the higher realms, etc., would appear without difference to those who have experienced them.

original: de'i phyir 'dis dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ma rtogs su zin kyang rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan de lta bu kho na la der lhag par zhen pas mgu bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dis dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ma rtogs su zin kyang rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan de lta bu kho na la der lhag par zhen pas mgu bar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, even though this does not understand the intrinsic reality of things, it is satisfied with just that conceptual image, because it is attached to it as if it were real.

original: sgra'i don rtogs pa ni de lta bu kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i don rtogs pa ni de lta bu kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of the word is just that.

original: des na rang gi mtshan nyid bstan to zhes de skad du brjod kyi /
analyzed: des na rang gi mtshan nyid bstan to zhes de skad du brjod kyi /
translated: Therefore, it is said that the intrinsic identity is taught,

original: rang gi ngo bo snang ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na bskyed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo snang ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na bskyed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: but not because it generates consciousness that appears as its intrinsic reality.

original: da ni 'o na ji ltar gcig tu log pa'i ngo bo can rnams la spyi zhes bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'o na ji ltar gcig tu log pa'i ngo bo can rnams la spyi zhes bya ste /
translated: Now, if the intrinsic reality of things is completely different, how can they be called universals?

original: de dag ma 'brel ba'i phyir dang / gzhan yang med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ma 'brel ba'i phyir dang / gzhan yang med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because they are not related and because they do not exist elsewhere.

original: spyi ji lta bu yin pa ni bshad zin te /
analyzed: spyi ji lta bu yin pa ni bshad zin te /
translated: The nature of a universal has already been explained.

original: ma 'dres pa rnams kyi cig shos dang ma 'brel ba de ni de las ldog pa can rnams kyi 'dra ba nyid yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: ma 'dres pa rnams kyi cig shos dang ma 'brel ba de ni de las ldog pa can rnams kyi 'dra ba nyid yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: It is said that the non-mixing of things is the similarity of those that are the opposite of that.

original: gzhan yang / tha dad dngos rnams la brten nas //
analyzed: gzhan yang / tha dad dngos rnams la brten nas //
translated: Moreover:üîΩThe mind that perceives a single object

original: don gcig tu ni snang ba'i blo //üîΩgang gi rang gi ngo bo yis //
analyzed: don gcig tu ni snang ba'i blo // gang gi rang gi ngo bo yis //
translated: In dependence on different thingsüîΩConceals the different natures

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo sgrib byed pa'i //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo sgrib byed pa'i //
translated: Of those things with its own nature.

original: kun rdzob des bdag tha dad kyang //
analyzed: kun rdzob des bdag tha dad kyang //
translated: Although the natures of things are different,

original: tha dad pa nyid bsgribs pa yi //üîΩdngos rnams ngo bo 'ga' zhig gis //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid bsgribs pa yi // dngos rnams ngo bo 'ga' zhig gis //
translated: The concealer of their differenceüîΩMakes things appear as if

original: tha dad min pa lta bur snang //
analyzed: tha dad min pa lta bur snang //
translated: They were not different in some way.

original: de la bsam pa'i dbang gis na //
analyzed: de la bsam pa'i dbang gis na //
translated: It is on the basis of this that

original: spyi yod par ni rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: spyi yod par ni rab tu bsgrags //
translated: The existence of universals is proclaimed.

original: de yis ji ltar kun brtags pa //
analyzed: de yis ji ltar kun brtags pa //
translated: But whatever is imagined by that

original: de ni dam pa'i don du med //
analyzed: de ni dam pa'i don du med //
translated: Does not exist in reality.

original: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo ni de dag las gzhan pa las ldog pa can gyi dngos po rnams la brten nas skye ba na /üîΩrang @282b gi bag chags kyi rang bzhin byed cing de dag gi ngo bo tha dad pa mi snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo ni de dag las gzhan pa las ldog pa can gyi dngos po rnams la brten nas skye ba na / rang @282b gi bag chags kyi rang bzhin byed cing de dag gi ngo bo tha dad pa mi snang bar byas nas /
translated: When the conceptual mind arises in dependence on things that are the opposite of those,üîΩit conceals the different natures of those things with its own nature, which is the nature of its own habitual tendencies.

original: bdag nyid kyi rnam pa tha dad pa med pa zhen par byas te /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi rnam pa tha dad pa med pa zhen par byas te /
translated: It makes them appear to be a single, undifferentiated form.

original: de rnams 'dres par kun du ston to //
analyzed: de rnams 'dres par kun du ston to //
translated: He shows that they are mixed.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa gcig pa can nyid kyis na gzhan las tha dad pa'i dngos po rnams dang / rnam par rtog pa de'i bag chags kyi rang bzhin na de dag las skye ba can 'di de lta bur snang ba gang yin pa de yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa gcig pa can nyid kyis na gzhan las tha dad pa'i dngos po rnams dang / rnam par rtog pa de'i bag chags kyi rang bzhin na de dag las skye ba can 'di de lta bur snang ba gang yin pa de yin no //
translated: The fact that the object to be established and the means of establishing are one is the nature of the latent impressions of that conceptualization, and it is that which causes the appearance of things that are different from one another.

original: da ni kun rdzob ste 'dis rang gi ngo bos gzhan gyi ngo bo sgrib pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni kun rdzob ste 'dis rang gi ngo bos gzhan gyi ngo bo sgrib pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, it is conventional because it obscures the nature of other things by its own nature.

original: de dag ni des tha dad pa bsgribs pas bdag nyid kyis tha dad kyang ngo bo 'ga' zhig gis tha mi dad pa bzhin du snang ngo //
analyzed: de dag ni des tha dad pa bsgribs pas bdag nyid kyis tha dad kyang ngo bo 'ga' zhig gis tha mi dad pa bzhin du snang ngo //
translated: Since they are obscured by that, they appear as if they were not different in some way, even though they are different by their own nature.

original: de bas na rjes su byed pa rnams kyi blo'i snang ba la blo la snang ba'i dngos po la rnam pa'i khyad par yongs su 'dzin pas phyi rol lta bur kun tu 'phro ba de dag kho na'i spyi yin bar brjod do //
analyzed: de bas na rjes su byed pa rnams kyi blo'i snang ba la blo la snang ba'i dngos po la rnam pa'i khyad par yongs su 'dzin pas phyi rol lta bur kun tu 'phro ba de dag kho na'i spyi yin bar brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the universal of those that are projected as if external is said to be the appearance in the cognition of those who are affected by it, because the cognition apprehends the specific form of the appearance in the cognition.

original: da ni ji ltar gzhan sel ba'i spyi yin zhe na /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar gzhan sel ba'i spyi yin zhe na /
translated: Now, how is it a universal of the exclusion of other?

original: de nyid gzhan sel ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid gzhan sel ba yin te /
translated: It is the exclusion of other,

original: de na de kho na 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'khrul pa'i phyir dngos po 'dzin pa lta bur snang ngo //
analyzed: de na de kho na 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'khrul pa'i phyir dngos po 'dzin pa lta bur snang ngo //
translated: because the conceptual thoughts that apprehend it appear as if they apprehend a thing, because they are naturally mistaken.

original: de ni de las gzhan pa las tha dad pa'i dngos po rnams kho na la skye ba na tha dad pa'i yul can zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: de ni de las gzhan pa las tha dad pa'i dngos po rnams kho na la skye ba na tha dad pa'i yul can zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: It is known as having a different object when it arises in only those things that are different from that.

original: phyi rol pa rnams tha dad pa yin na de dag la ni rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa yin nam /
analyzed: phyi rol pa rnams tha dad pa yin na de dag la ni rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa yin nam /
translated: Do the non-Buddhists not engage in conceptual thoughts when they are different?

original: ji ltar de dag la skye zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag la skye zhe na /
translated: How do they arise?

original: 'chad par byed pa rnams de ltar rnam par 'byed par byed kyi /
analyzed: 'chad par byed pa rnams de ltar rnam par 'byed par byed kyi /
translated: The commentators analyze it in that way,

original: tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: but not the users of conventions.

original: de dag ni rang gi dmigs pa kho na don byed par rung bar sems shing snang ba dang / rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu byas nas 'jug go //
analyzed: de dag ni rang gi dmigs pa kho na don byed par rung bar sems shing snang ba dang / rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu byas nas 'jug go //
translated: They think that only their own objects are suitable to perform a function, and they engage in them by making the objects that appear and are to be imagined into one.

original: de dag gi bsam pa'i dbang gis de skad ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du sgras de byed pa nyid kyis de byed pa ma yin pa dag las log pa rnams ston par byed do zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de dag gi bsam pa'i dbang gis de skad ces bya ba dang / de bzhin du sgras de byed pa nyid kyis de byed pa ma yin pa dag las log pa rnams ston par byed do zhes brjod do //
translated: And in the same way, it is said that sound indicates the exclusion of that which does not perform the function of that which performs the function.

original: de kho na nyid sems par byed pa rnams ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid sems par byed pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who think about reality

original: snang ba tha dad pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas tha dad pa med par mi sems so //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas tha dad pa med par mi sems so //
translated: do not think that there is no difference in terms of different appearances and so on.

original: gal te rtogs pa pa'i bsam pa'i rjes su byed na gzhan sel ba yang spyi yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te rtogs pa pa'i bsam pa'i rjes su byed na gzhan sel ba yang spyi yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If it follows the thought of the realists, then exclusion of other would also be a universal.

original: de ltar rtogs pa ni med do zhe na /üîΩde ltar @283a * //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa ni med do zhe na / de ltar @283a * //
translated: But such a thought does not exist.

original: mi rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bsal ba las tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dang / gcig pa dang khyab pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pas kyang mi rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bsal ba las tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dang / gcig pa dang khyab pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pas kyang mi rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: Not only is it not understood in that way, it is also not understood in terms of being different or not different from the excluded, being the same or being pervasion and so on.

original: blo rnam pa tha mi dad pa can skye ba de'i rten gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: blo rnam pa tha mi dad pa can skye ba de'i rten gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the basis of the arising of the mind that has an undifferentiated aspect?

original: gzhan sel ba yin no zhes brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba yin no zhes brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
translated: It is merely said that it is an exclusion of other.

original: de ni dngos po rnams la yod pa'i phyir dang / 'gal ba med pa'i phyir dang / sgra'i rten can gyi tha snyad kyang de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dngos po rnams la yod pa'i phyir dang / 'gal ba med pa'i phyir dang / sgra'i rten can gyi tha snyad kyang de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it exists in things, because there is no contradiction, and because the conventions that are the basis of words appear in that way.

original: blo 'di ji ltar snang ba lta bur spyi zhes bya ba dngos por gyur pa ni cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: blo 'di ji ltar snang ba lta bur spyi zhes bya ba dngos por gyur pa ni cung zad kyang med de /
translated: As for this cognition, there is not the slightest so-called universal that exists as an entity as it appears.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / bsal ba rnams ni rjes mi 'gro //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bsal ba rnams ni rjes mi 'gro //
translated: The exclusions do not follow.

original: rjes 'gro gzhan ni snang ba med //üîΩbsal ba 'di dag ni phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes 'gro gzhan ni snang ba med // bsal ba 'di dag ni phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: There is no appearance of another that follows.

original: tha dad pa med pas spyi nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pas spyi nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: These exclusions do not follow each other because if they were not different, it would follow that there would be no universal.

original: de rnams las gzhan pa tha dad pa yang cung zad kyang de lta bu'i blo la mi snang ste /
analyzed: de rnams las gzhan pa tha dad pa yang cung zad kyang de lta bu'i blo la mi snang ste /
translated: There is not the slightest difference from them that appears to such a cognition.

original: mi snang na ji ltar bdag nyid du gzhan 'dzin pa'am tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: mi snang na ji ltar bdag nyid du gzhan 'dzin pa'am tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
translated: If it does not appear, how could it be apprehended or designated as another?

original: de dag dang 'brel pa gcig yod pa'i phyir yang spyi yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag dang 'brel pa gcig yod pa'i phyir yang spyi yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not a universal because it is related to one thing,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that everything would be a universal.

original: gal te tha mi dad pa'i brjod pa dang / blo'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa gcig spyi yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tha mi dad pa'i brjod pa dang / blo'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa gcig spyi yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a universal because it is the basis of the expression and cognition of nondifference, but not because it is the basis of all expressions and cognitions,

original: ji ltar gzhan gyi sgo nas gzhan gyi la shes pa 'jug / de dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan gyi sgo nas gzhan gyi la shes pa 'jug / de dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: then how could the cognition of one thing be applied to another on the basis of that?

original: grangs dang 'bras bu'i rdzas la sogs pa yod na yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grangs dang 'bras bu'i rdzas la sogs pa yod na yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that it is because of its relation to that, then it would follow, absurdly, that even when there is no number, result, substance, etc.,

original: gal te spyi'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because it is not the nature of a universal,

original: spyi'i bdag nyid 'di gang yin zhes de nyid dpyod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: spyi'i bdag nyid 'di gang yin zhes de nyid dpyod pa ma yin nam /
translated: then are you not analyzing the nature of a universal by asking what the nature of a universal is?

original: de la 'brel pa yod na shes pa 'jug ste /
analyzed: de la 'brel pa yod na shes pa 'jug ste /
translated: If it exists, then cognition is applied to it.

original: des na spyi yin no zhes smras pa de la bshad pa rgyu mtshan srid pa'i phyir rdzas la sogs pa du ma dang 'brel pa can dag las kyang shes pa 'jug ste /
analyzed: des na spyi yin no zhes smras pa de la bshad pa rgyu mtshan srid pa'i phyir rdzas la sogs pa du ma dang 'brel pa can dag las kyang shes pa 'jug ste /
translated: Therefore, since it is possible to explain that it is a universal, consciousness engages its many related objects such as substance.

original: de'i phyir spyi'i bdag nyid yin no //üîΩde lta ma yin na gzhan la yang mi 'jug ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi'i bdag nyid yin no // de lta ma yin na gzhan la yang mi 'jug ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the nature of a universal.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that were not so, it would not engage other objects because there would be no difference.

original: de lta na ni rdzas dang yon tan dang spyi rnams kyi ngo bo 'chol ba yin no //üîΩde lta na 'o na ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni rdzas dang yon tan dang spyi rnams kyi ngo bo 'chol ba yin no // de lta na 'o na ni /
translated: In that case, the nature of substance, quality, and universals would be confused.

original: blo'i snang ba kho na shes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir yod pa nyid @283b pas spyi yin no zhe na /
analyzed: blo'i snang ba kho na shes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir yod pa nyid @283b pas spyi yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then since the appearance to awareness is the nature of consciousness, it is a universal because it exists.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / shes dang tha dad ma yin pa /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / 'di ltar / shes dang tha dad ma yin pa /
translated: That is not so.

original: ji ltar don gzhan 'brang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar don gzhan 'brang bar 'gyur //
translated: How could that which is not different from consciousnessüîΩBe the universal of other objects?

original: shes pa po'i ngo bo ji ltar don gzhan rnams kyi spyi yin te /
analyzed: shes pa po'i ngo bo ji ltar don gzhan rnams kyi spyi yin te /
translated: How could the nature of the knower be the universal of other objects?

original: de ni de rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni de rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist in them.

original: gal te de'i ngo bo zhen pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te de'i ngo bo zhen pa'i phyir /
translated: If you think that it is the nature of the knower because it is conceived to be so,

original: de ltar 'khrul pas tha snyad 'dogs so zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar 'khrul pas tha snyad 'dogs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that conventional expressions are made by such error,

original: de la de ltar shes pa skye ba'i rgyu gang zhig yin /
analyzed: de la de ltar shes pa skye ba'i rgyu gang zhig yin /
translated: what is the cause of the arising of such knowledge?üîΩIf it arises without a basis, then it would arise everywhere.

original: rten med par skye na ni thams cad la 'gyur ro rnam pa gcig tu na shes pa gcig dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa ji ltar shes pa gzhan bsal ba gzhan las byung ba'i ngo bo yin /
analyzed: rten med par skye na ni thams cad la 'gyur ro rnam pa gcig tu na shes pa gcig dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa ji ltar shes pa gzhan bsal ba gzhan las byung ba'i ngo bo yin /
translated: Or, if it is not different from a single cognition, how can it be the nature of another cognition that arises from another object?

original: de'i phyir shes pa gzhan dang bsal ba gzhan la khyad par byed pa ma yin pa ji ltar spyi yin par 'gyur /üîΩde ltas don la gcig bdag tu //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa gzhan dang bsal ba gzhan la khyad par byed pa ma yin pa ji ltar spyi yin par 'gyur / de ltas don la gcig bdag tu //
translated: Therefore, how can it be a universal that does not distinguish another cognition from another object?üîΩThus, this conception

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog 'di 'khrul pa //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog 'di 'khrul pa //
translated: that apprehends a single self in a thing is erroneous.

original: don rnams ni tha dad pa'am tha dad pa ma yin pas kyang rung bdag nyid gang gis kyang mtshungs pa ma yin pas de rnams la de ltar 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'khrul pa yin no //üîΩming don gang ldan phan tshun du //
analyzed: don rnams ni tha dad pa'am tha dad pa ma yin pas kyang rung bdag nyid gang gis kyang mtshungs pa ma yin pas de rnams la de ltar 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'khrul pa yin no // ming don gang ldan phan tshun du //
translated: Things are not similar in any way, whether they are different or not different. Therefore, the conception that apprehends them in that way is erroneous.üîΩThe seed of this difference

original: tha dad pa 'di'i sa bon yin //
analyzed: tha dad pa 'di'i sa bon yin //
translated: is the name that is associated with the object.

original: bsgrub par bya ba tha mi dad pa can gyi dngos po rnams de'i bsgrub par bya ba can ma yin pa dag las shes par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba tha mi dad pa can gyi dngos po rnams de'i bsgrub par bya ba can ma yin pa dag las shes par bya ste /
translated: Things that are not to be established are to be known from those things that are to be established.

original: de dag yongs su spangs nas 'jug par 'gyur bar gang zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir brdar byed pa phan tshun tha dad pa de ni nor ba'i rnam par rtog pa gcig gi bdag nyid du snang ba can de'i sa bon te /
analyzed: de dag yongs su spangs nas 'jug par 'gyur bar gang zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir brdar byed pa phan tshun tha dad pa de ni nor ba'i rnam par rtog pa gcig gi bdag nyid du snang ba can de'i sa bon te /
translated: The sign is the seed of that, which is the appearance of the nature of a single mistaken conception, for the sake of knowing which the sign is made in order to engage in the complete abandonment of those things that are not to be established.

original: rnam par rtog pa 'di ni de kho na 'dzin pa na rang gi bag chags kyi rang bzhin las de ltar snang ngo //üîΩyang ji ltar na gang gis na de ma yin pa dag las log pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa zhes brjod pa /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'di ni de kho na 'dzin pa na rang gi bag chags kyi rang bzhin las de ltar snang ngo // yang ji ltar na gang gis na de ma yin pa dag las log pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa zhes brjod pa /
translated: When this conception apprehends reality, it appears in that way due to the nature of its own latent propensities.

original: tha dad pa rnams kyi 'bras bu tha mi dad pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams kyi 'bras bu tha mi dad pa yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it that the effect of different things is undifferentiated, due to which they are said to be undifferentiated from that?

original: dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu yin te //üîΩgcig rtogs don shes la sogs pa //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu yin te // gcig rtogs don shes la sogs pa //
translated: The nature of things is as follows.üîΩSome are for the sake of knowing one thing,

original: don gcig bsgrub la kha cig ni //
analyzed: don gcig bsgrub la kha cig ni //
translated: and some are for the sake of accomplishing one thing.

original: tha dad yin yang rang bzhin gyis //üîΩnges te dbang po la sogs bzhin //
analyzed: tha dad yin yang rang bzhin gyis // nges te dbang po la sogs bzhin //
translated: Even though they are different,üîΩthey are ascertained by nature, like the sense faculties and so on.

original: ji ltar dbang po dang yul dang snang ba dang / yid la byed pa rnams sam /
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po dang yul dang snang ba dang / yid la byed pa rnams sam /
translated: Just as the sense faculties, objects, light, and attention,

original: bdag dang dbang po dang yid @284a * //
analyzed: bdag dang dbang po dang yid @284a * //
translated: or the self, sense faculties, mind,

original: dang don dang de rnams phrad pas de'i ngo bor nges pa'i spyi med kyang /
analyzed: dang don dang de rnams phrad pas de'i ngo bor nges pa'i spyi med kyang /
translated: and objects, even though they do not have a universal that is ascertained as their nature through contact with those,

original: gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa gcig bskyed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa gcig bskyed pa de bzhin du /
translated: generate a single consciousness of form.

original: shing sha pa la sogs pa tha dad pa dag kyang phan tshun rjes su mi 'gro ba yang rang bzhin kho nas rnam pa gcig tu mngon par shes pa'am /
analyzed: shing sha pa la sogs pa tha dad pa dag kyang phan tshun rjes su mi 'gro ba yang rang bzhin kho nas rnam pa gcig tu mngon par shes pa'am /
translated: In the same way, even though different things like a teak tree are not mutually pervasive, they are ascertained by nature alone as a single aspect,

original: gzhan me dang khyim la sogs pa shing gis bsgrub par bya ba'i don bya ba rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du skyed par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan me dang khyim la sogs pa shing gis bsgrub par bya ba'i don bya ba rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du skyed par byed do //
translated: or they generate the activity of the purpose to be accomplished by the tree, such as fire and a house, in accordance with the conditions.

original: tha dad pa khyad par med kyang chu la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa khyad par med kyang chu la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But water and so on are not like that, even though they are not different.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: They are like the ear and so on for the consciousness of form and so on.

original: dper sman kha gcig tha dad kyang //
analyzed: dper sman kha gcig tha dad kyang //
translated: For example, some medicines are different,

original: lhan cig pa'am ma so so yis //
analyzed: lhan cig pa'am ma so so yis //
translated: but when combined or individually,

original: rims la sogs pa zhi byed pa //
analyzed: rims la sogs pa zhi byed pa //
translated: they are seen to cure fevers and so on,

original: gzhan gyis ma yin mthong ba bzhin //üîΩyang na dper na sle tres kyis bsal ba la sogs pa lhan cig pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ma yin mthong ba bzhin // yang na dper na sle tres kyis bsal ba la sogs pa lhan cig pa'am /
translated: not by other means.

original: so sor rims la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu gcig byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: so sor rims la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu gcig byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: Or, for example, like the effect of a single medicine, such as harƒ´takƒ´, which cures fevers and so on, either when combined or individually.

original: de la spyi la ltos pa ni med do //
analyzed: de la spyi la ltos pa ni med do //
translated: In that case, there is no reliance on a universal.

original: tha dad kyang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad kyang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even though they are different, they have that nature.

original: der khyad par med kyang zho dang ga gon la sogs pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: der khyad par med kyang zho dang ga gon la sogs pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: Even though there is no difference there, it is not from curd, eggplant, and so on.

original: gal te 'di snyam du de lta bu de dag la spyi nyid cung zad cig yod de /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du de lta bu de dag la spyi nyid cung zad cig yod de /
translated: If you think that in those cases there is a universal,

original: de kho na la 'bras bu gcig pa der 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de kho na la 'bras bu gcig pa der 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
translated: and that effect would be the same for that alone,

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is illogical.

original: spyi khyad par med phyir spyis 'bras bu de byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi khyad par med phyir spyis 'bras bu de byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the universal is undifferentiated, the universal does not produce that effect.

original: de dag zhing sogs tha dad kyang //
analyzed: de dag zhing sogs tha dad kyang //
translated: Even though the fields and so on are different,

original: khyad par med par thal 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: khyad par med par thal 'gyur zhing //
translated: And the consequence is that there is no difference.üîΩ

original: gal te spyi las rims la sogs pa zhi ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te spyi las rims la sogs pa zhi ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur na /
translated: If the result of pacification were from the universal,

original: de la khyad par med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de la khyad par med pa'i phyir //
translated: then, because there would be no difference in the universal,

original: bsal ba rnams kyi zhing la sogs pa tha dad kyang /
analyzed: bsal ba rnams kyi zhing la sogs pa tha dad kyang /
translated: the fields, etc., of the particulars would be different,üîΩbut the pacification would not be different, and the difference of the pot, etc.,

original: zhi ba myur ba dang / bum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang / yon tan mchog dang / ches mchog tu yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba myur ba dang / bum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang / yon tan mchog dang / ches mchog tu yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the excellence and the highest excellence of the qualities would not exist.

original: 'on te spyi la khyad par yod na ni ngo bo nyid tha dad pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyams pa yin no //üîΩspyi brtan pas phan 'dogs med phyir yang gal te 'dis phan 'dogs par byed na ni /
analyzed: 'on te spyi la khyad par yod na ni ngo bo nyid tha dad pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyams pa yin no // spyi brtan pas phan 'dogs med phyir yang gal te 'dis phan 'dogs par byed na ni /
translated: But if there is a difference in the universal, then because of the difference in its own nature, it loses its own nature.

original: bogs dbyung du med pa ni gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bogs dbyung du med pa ni gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: If it helps, then because it is not increased, it does not depend on another.

original: rang gi 'bras bu thams cad cig car skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi 'bras bu thams cad cig car skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, all its results would be produced simultaneously.

original: yang na ni bskyed @284b pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: yang na ni bskyed @284b pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: Or else, it would not have the nature of producing.

original: bsal ba dus dang / yul dang legs par bya ba'i dbang gis khyad par 'byung ba can rnams ni 'bras bu khyad par can byed pa zhes bya ba la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: bsal ba dus dang / yul dang legs par bya ba'i dbang gis khyad par 'byung ba can rnams ni 'bras bu khyad par can byed pa zhes bya ba la 'gal ba med do //
translated: But there is no contradiction in saying that the effect is distinctive when the cause is distinctive due to the distinction of time, place, and proper action.

original: de bzhin du don kha cig kyang rang gi ngo bo tha dad kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du don kha cig kyang rang gi ngo bo tha dad kyang /
translated: Similarly, although some objects have different natures,

original: gcig tu mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i don bya ba byed pa na /üîΩde mi byed pa can dag las tha dad pa'i phyir ram /üîΩgcig gis du ma bskyed pa na des bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa dag las tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig tu mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i don bya ba byed pa na / de mi byed pa can dag las tha dad pa'i phyir ram / gcig gis du ma bskyed pa na des bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa dag las tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: when they perform the same function, such as being the object of cognition,üîΩthey are said to be undifferentiated because they are undifferentiated from those that do not perform that function.

original: tha mi dad pa zhes bya'o //üîΩyang ci mtshan nyid tha dad pa can gyi spyi 'di rang gi mtshan nyid dang mtshungs so zhes bya bar shes par bya'am /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa zhes bya'o // yang ci mtshan nyid tha dad pa can gyi spyi 'di rang gi mtshan nyid dang mtshungs so zhes bya bar shes par bya'am /
translated: Or, when one produces many, they are said to be undifferentiated because they are undifferentiated from those that are not produced by that.

original: 'on te gzhan kho na dang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan kho na dang yin zhe na /
translated: Now, should this universal that has a different characteristic from its own be understood to be the same as its own characteristic or is it something else?

original: de las cir 'gyur /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur /
translated: What follows from that?

original: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid yin na ni ji ltar rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin /
analyzed: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid yin na ni ji ltar rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin /
translated: If it is the same as its own characteristic, how can it be the object of conception?

original: yang na ni gzhan gyi ji ltar don byed /
analyzed: yang na ni gzhan gyi ji ltar don byed /
translated: Or else, how could it benefit others?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa mi rtogs pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo ma yin la /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa mi rtogs pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo ma yin la /
translated: Because impermanence and so on are not realized in the intrinsic character of things, they are not the nature of things.

original: de dag kyang dngos po'i chos nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang dngos po'i chos nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And those are not the reality of things.

original: des ni nyes pa med de /
analyzed: des ni nyes pa med de /
translated: This is not a fault.

original: shes pa la snang ba'i don la spyi dang gzhi mthun pa dang / chos dang chos can gyi tha snyad rnams 'dogs te /üîΩdngos po'i rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pas nyams su myong bas gzhag pa'i bag chags la brten nas rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags skye ba gang yin pa 'di ni de'i yul can ma yin yang /
analyzed: shes pa la snang ba'i don la spyi dang gzhi mthun pa dang / chos dang chos can gyi tha snyad rnams 'dogs te / dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pas nyams su myong bas gzhag pa'i bag chags la brten nas rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags skye ba gang yin pa 'di ni de'i yul can ma yin yang /
translated: The convention of universals, common loci, phenomena and objects possessing phenomena are imputed to objects that appear to consciousness.üîΩThe conceptual imprints that arise from the imprints of experience that apprehend the intrinsic nature of things are not the objects of that consciousness.

original: de'i yul can lta bu de nyams su myong bas gzhag pa'i bag chags las skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i yul can lta bu de nyams su myong bas gzhag pa'i bag chags las skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But because they arise from the imprints of experience that are like the objects of that consciousness, they are by nature like the objects of that consciousness.

original: de'i dngos por lhag par zhen pa'i rang gi ngo bo can 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'i dngos po las skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i dngos por lhag par zhen pa'i rang gi ngo bo can 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'i dngos po las skye ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it arises from a thing that is not different from the effect, which has the nature of being the object of the conception that conceives the entity of the thing.

original: don tha mi dad pa 'dzin pa lta bu don dam par na de las gzhan pa las tha dad pa dang / rnam pa mtshungs pa can yin te /
analyzed: don tha mi dad pa 'dzin pa lta bu don dam par na de las gzhan pa las tha dad pa dang / rnam pa mtshungs pa can yin te /
translated: Like the apprehension of a non-different object, it is ultimately the same as that, in that it is different from something else.

original: de la don gyi rnam pa yod pa ni tha snyad 'dogs pa rnams de ltar lhag par zhen nas 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la don gyi rnam pa yod pa ni tha snyad 'dogs pa rnams de ltar lhag par zhen nas 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: The existence of the aspect of the object is because those who impute the convention engage in that way, conceiving it to be so.

original: phyi rol lta bu dang / gcig pa lta bu dang / don mi byed kyang de byed pa lta bur snang ste /
analyzed: phyi rol lta bu dang / gcig pa lta bu dang / don mi byed kyang de byed pa lta bur snang ste /
translated: It appears as if external, as if one, and as if it performs the function of the object, even though it does not.

original: gzhan du na 'jug pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'jug pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
