translated: Otherwise, engagement would be impossible.

original: de ni don bya ba byed pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni don bya ba byed pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it appears to perform the function of the object,

original: de ni byed pa dag la tha dad pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: de ni byed pa dag la tha dad pa lta bu ste /
translated: it is as if it were different from the agent.

original: de yang brtag pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang brtag pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But that is not the case, because it is not a part of the analysis.

original: de kho na nyid ma yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ma yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained that it is not reality.

original: blo la gnas pa'i don de @285a * //
analyzed: blo la gnas pa'i don de @285a * //
translated: The object that exists in the mind

original: dag ni de dang mtshungs so zhes bya bar 'dzin te /
analyzed: dag ni de dang mtshungs so zhes bya bar 'dzin te /
translated: and they grasp them as being the same.

original: 'ga' zhig las log par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig las log par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are seen as absent in some cases.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But they are not particular inherent characteristics,

original: de la mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not seen in those.

original: de dag nyid 'ga' zhig las log pa na gzhan yang ldog pa dang ldan pa dang / tha mi dad par yang snang ngo //
analyzed: de dag nyid 'ga' zhig las log pa na gzhan yang ldog pa dang ldan pa dang / tha mi dad par yang snang ngo //
translated: When they are absent in some cases, they are seen as present in others, and as not different.

original: bdag nyid kyis med kyang blos de ltar ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis med kyang blos de ltar ston pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though they do not exist by themselves, the mind shows them as such.

original: nor ba'i don kho na la spyi dang gzhi mthun pa'i tha snyad 'dogs so //
analyzed: nor ba'i don kho na la spyi dang gzhi mthun pa'i tha snyad 'dogs so //
translated: Therefore, the terms ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù and ‚Äúcommon locus‚Äù are applied to the very same error.üîΩAll of this is a contamination created by the latent potentialities that are deposited by the perception of particular inherent characteristics.

original: 'di thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid dag kho na mthong bas gzhag pa'i bag chags kyis byas pa'i bslad pa yin pa las de dang 'brel pa las skye ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni de de snang ba nyid ma yin yang dngos po la mi bslu ste
analyzed: 'di thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid dag kho na mthong bas gzhag pa'i bag chags kyis byas pa'i bslad pa yin pa las de dang 'brel pa las skye ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni de de snang ba nyid ma yin yang dngos po la mi bslu ste
translated: The conceptual thoughts that arise in connection with them are not mistaken with regard to things, even though they do not appear as they are,

original: / nor bu'i 'od la nor bu 'khrul pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: / nor bu'i 'od la nor bu 'khrul pa lta bu'o //
translated: just as the light of a jewel is not mistaken for the jewel itself.

original: gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
translated: But others are not.

original: de'i khyad par las rab tu skye ba yin yang ji ltar mthong ba'i khyad par gyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bor nas 'dra ba cung zad tsam gzung bas khyad par gzhan sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir mar me'i 'od la nor bu'i blo lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i khyad par las rab tu skye ba yin yang ji ltar mthong ba'i khyad par gyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bor nas 'dra ba cung zad tsam gzung bas khyad par gzhan sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir mar me'i 'od la nor bu'i blo lta bu'o //
translated: Although it arises from a particular, it is like the cognition of a gem in the light of a lamp, because it superimposes another particular, having abandoned the particular that is seen, by apprehending only a slight similarity.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i yul gyi don rnams la don bya ba byed pa nyid med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i yul gyi don rnams la don bya ba byed pa nyid med do //
translated: Therefore, the objects of conceptual cognition do not perform a function.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that impermanence and so on do not exist in their own characteristics.

original: ltar dngos po g-yo ba la ma rtogs pa nyid ces bya ba ni cung zad kyang med kyi /
analyzed: ltar dngos po g-yo ba la ma rtogs pa nyid ces bya ba ni cung zad kyang med kyi /
translated: In that way, there is not even the slightest thing called ‚Äúnon-impermanence‚Äù in a moving thing.

original: de de lta bu la skad cig mar gnas pa'i chos nyid du gzung ba'i phyir /üîΩ'di snyam du 'di ni mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: de de lta bu la skad cig mar gnas pa'i chos nyid du gzung ba'i phyir / 'di snyam du 'di ni mi rtag pa'o //
translated: Because it is apprehended as having the nature of momentary abiding in that way,üîΩone thinks, ‚ÄúThis is impermanent.‚Äù

original: 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid do snyam du sems so //
analyzed: 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid do snyam du sems so //
translated: One thinks, ‚ÄúThis is impermanence.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni de'i chos nyid kho na la 'jug pa na chos du ma dang gcig pa dang tha dad pa dag tu ston par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni de'i chos nyid kho na la 'jug pa na chos du ma dang gcig pa dang tha dad pa dag tu ston par bya'o //
translated: When conceptualization engages the reality of that, it should be shown as many things, one, and different.

original: de rnams rten med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnams rten med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And those are not without a basis,

original: de'i khyad par mthong ba la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i khyad par mthong ba la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are based on the perception of its distinctions.

original: dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it a reality that is a non-entity,

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo kho na de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo kho na de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because its own nature is just such an appearance.

original: dngos po la du ma dang gcig pa dang tha dad par 'dzin pa ni 'khrul par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po la du ma dang gcig pa dang tha dad par 'dzin pa ni 'khrul par 'gyur te /
translated: The apprehension of entities as many, one, and different is mistaken,

original: don gcig dang du ma byed pa de la de ltar shes par 'dod na de lta bu'i ngo bo bstan pa'i ched du de ltar gzhag par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gcig dang du ma byed pa de la de ltar shes par 'dod na de lta bu'i ngo bo bstan pa'i ched du de ltar gzhag par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if one wishes to know that which performs the function of one and many, it is posited in that way for the purpose of teaching such a nature.

original: dngos po'i khyad par gyi sgo nas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i khyad par gyi sgo nas ni ma yin te /
translated: But not in terms of the distinctions of entities.

original: gcig po de la du @285b ma nyid mi rung ba'i phyir dang / du ma la'ang gcig pa nyid mi rung ba'i phyir dang / tha dad pa yang bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig po de la du @285b ma nyid mi rung ba'i phyir dang / du ma la'ang gcig pa nyid mi rung ba'i phyir dang / tha dad pa yang bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible that a single thing is many, because it is not possible that many things are one, and because difference has been refuted.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: because their natures are different.

original: sgra'i don dngos po ji lta ba bzhin yin par khas len na gzhi mthun pa nyid mi rung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te khyad par de dag dang ldan pa gcig brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra'i don dngos po ji lta ba bzhin yin par khas len na gzhi mthun pa nyid mi rung ba'i phyir ro // gal te khyad par de dag dang ldan pa gcig brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: If one accepts that the meaning of the word is just the thing, then it is not possible that they are the same.

original: nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because one is described as having those differences,

original: phan mi 'dogs pa la gzhan gyi dbang nyid mi rung ba'i phyir khyad par ma yin no //
analyzed: phan mi 'dogs pa la gzhan gyi dbang nyid mi rung ba'i phyir khyad par ma yin no //
translated: then it is not a difference because it is not possible that what does not benefit is another.

original: gzhan gyi dbang nyid yin na ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin pas lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang nyid yin na ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin pas lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: If it were another, it would be the thing that is produced and the producer, and because they do not coexist,

original: gnyis su brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis su brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not described as two.

original: blos gcig sgro btags na ni sgra dngos po'i yul can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: blos gcig sgro btags na ni sgra dngos po'i yul can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the mind superimposes one, the word would not have a thing as its object.

original: blo la snang ba'i yul can nyid gcig yin na ni thams cad kyang de kho na dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: blo la snang ba'i yul can nyid gcig yin na ni thams cad kyang de kho na dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the subjective aspect that appears to the mind is one, then all would be just like that.

original: 'dzin pa la de lta bu'i khyad par tha dad pa dang ldan pa gcig pu mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la de lta bu'i khyad par tha dad pa dang ldan pa gcig pu mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the grasping does not appear to have a difference of that kind, as a single thing.

original: gal te khyad par de dang ldan pa phan par bya ba dang / phan par byed pa dag kyang lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par de dang ldan pa phan par bya ba dang / phan par byed pa dag kyang lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because the object and the subject, which have that kind of difference, exist simultaneously,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: grub pa la gzhan gyi dbang med pa'i phyir khyad par nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa la gzhan gyi dbang med pa'i phyir khyad par nyid ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no dependence on something else in the established, there is no difference.

original: ma grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there nonestablishment,

original: rang gi ngo bor ma reng pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor ma reng pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no dependence on a selfnature.

original: rnam pa thams cad du gzhan gyi dbang nyid med pas rtogs pas sgro gdags par byas nas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gzhan gyi dbang nyid med pas rtogs pas sgro gdags par byas nas /
translated: Since there is no dependence on something else in any way, the imagination is made to be a superimposition.

original: tha snyad 'dogs na ni thams cad du blo de kho na ci ste mi sbyor /
analyzed: tha snyad 'dogs na ni thams cad du blo de kho na ci ste mi sbyor /
translated: If it is designated, why is that mind not applied in all cases?

original: sgra dang tshad ma gcig gis yul du byas na dngos po'i stobs kyis khyad par ma lus pa 'phangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra dang tshad ma gcig gis yul du byas na dngos po'i stobs kyis khyad par ma lus pa 'phangs pa'i phyir /
translated: If one object is taken as the object of both sound and valid cognition, then all the particularities are implied by the power of the thing.

original: de las gzhan pa don med par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa don med par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it is not meaningless to have something other than that,

original: blo la snang ba ni dngos po med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: blo la snang ba ni dngos po med pa'i phyir /
translated: because what appears to the mind is not a non-thing.

original: dngos po'i mthu las 'byung ba rnams su thal ba med do //üîΩde tha mi dad pa yang rnam pa gcig gi yul du byas kyang rnam pa gzhan ma nges pa rnams rnam pa gzhan la re ba dang bcas pa'i blos gzung bar bya ba dang / sgra'i don tha dad pa bsgrub pa dag kyang tha mi dad par blo la snang bas spyi dang khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po dang /
analyzed: dngos po'i mthu las 'byung ba rnams su thal ba med do // de tha mi dad pa yang rnam pa gcig gi yul du byas kyang rnam pa gzhan ma nges pa rnams rnam pa gzhan la re ba dang bcas pa'i blos gzung bar bya ba dang / sgra'i don tha dad pa bsgrub pa dag kyang tha mi dad par blo la snang bas spyi dang khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po dang /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that it follows that they arise from the power of things.

original: gzhi mthun pa rnams ji ltar shes pa bzhin mi 'gal lo //üîΩ'di'i chos dang chos @286a * //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa rnams ji ltar shes pa bzhin mi 'gal lo // 'di'i chos dang chos @286a * //
translated: Even though the non-different is taken as the object of one aspect, the other aspects that are not ascertained are to be apprehended by a mind that has expectation of other aspects, and the established different meanings of words also appear to the mind as non-different. Therefore, the entities of universals, particulars, and particular instances, and common loci are not contradictory as they are known.

original: can gyi khyad par dag kyang don du ma las tha dad pa la /
analyzed: can gyi khyad par dag kyang don du ma las tha dad pa la /
translated: Here, the distinctions of the property and the property-possessor are also different from the many meanings.

original: don gcig cig las tha dad pa de sgrub pa dang / dgag pa shes par 'dod pa dang dngos po de kho na chos zhes bya ba'i sgra khyad par gzhan spangs pas brjod nas blo la de ltar snang ba'i phyir ;
analyzed: don gcig cig las tha dad pa de sgrub pa dang / dgag pa shes par 'dod pa dang dngos po de kho na chos zhes bya ba'i sgra khyad par gzhan spangs pas brjod nas blo la de ltar snang ba'i phyir ;
translated: Because of the desire to know the proof of that which is different from the one thing, and because of the desire to know the negation of that which is not different from the one thing, and because of the desire to know the thing itself, the word ‚Äúquality‚Äù is used to exclude other differences, and the mind appears in that way.

original: chos tha dad pa lta bu dang bye brag tu ma phye bar 'di'i ngo bo nyid gzhan chos can nyid du rnam par bzhag nas rab tu ston to //üîΩde tsam gyi chas chos dang chos can dag tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos tha dad pa lta bu dang bye brag tu ma phye bar 'di'i ngo bo nyid gzhan chos can nyid du rnam par bzhag nas rab tu ston to // de tsam gyi chas chos dang chos can dag tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: Without differentiating the different qualities, the nature of that is established as the substratum, and it is taught.

original: blo tha dad pa dang ldan pa lta bur snang gi dngos po tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: blo tha dad pa dang ldan pa lta bur snang gi dngos po tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
translated: Because of the difference of the qualities in that much, the mind appears as if it has a difference, but not because of the difference of the thing.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the fault explained above.

original: tha dad pa de lta bu mang po brjod pas tshig tha dad pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa tha dad pa chos snang ba'i khyad par de'i rang gi ngo bo la brten pa can dag gis /
analyzed: tha dad pa de lta bu mang po brjod pas tshig tha dad pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa tha dad pa chos snang ba'i khyad par de'i rang gi ngo bo la brten pa can dag gis /
translated: By the many expressions of that kind of difference, the difference of words, the difference of the probandum, and the difference of the proof, the difference of the appearance of the quality, which is based on the nature of that,

original: de'i rang gi ngo bos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir byed do //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir byed do //
translated: In order to understand its nature, it is created.

original: rang bzhin de 'dzin rnam rtog blo //
analyzed: rang bzhin de 'dzin rnam rtog blo //
translated: The conceptual mind that apprehends that nature

original: don med kyang de'i don can 'dra //
analyzed: don med kyang de'i don can 'dra //
translated: Is like having an object that is not an object.

original: de yi 'bras can min don las //üîΩtha dad mthar thug skye ba dang // de la ngo bo phyi rol dang // gcig ltar gzhan las log lta bur //
analyzed: de yi 'bras can min don las // tha dad mthar thug skye ba dang // de la ngo bo phyi rol dang // gcig ltar gzhan las log lta bur //
translated: It is not the result of that object,üîΩBut arises from the ultimate, which is different from it.üîΩThe appearance of that nature as external

original: snang ba gang yin brtag pa yi //
analyzed: snang ba gang yin brtag pa yi //
translated: And as if different from other things,üîΩIs an imputation.

original: yan lag med phyir de nyid min //
analyzed: yan lag med phyir de nyid min //
translated: Because it has no parts, it is not reality.

original: shes pa yod pa'i don de rnams //
analyzed: shes pa yod pa'i don de rnams //
translated: The objects that exist for consciousness

original: 'di ltar ldog pa'i ngo bo can //üîΩdes na tha dad min lta bur //üîΩde nyid gzhan las log par yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar ldog pa'i ngo bo can // des na tha dad min lta bur // de nyid gzhan las log par yang //
translated: Have a nature that is a negation.üîΩTherefore, they appear as if they are not different,üîΩAnd as if they are the opposite of other things.

original: snang ste de la spyi dang ni //üîΩgzhi mthun spyod yul can dag gi / shes pa dang ni brjod pa yis //
analyzed: snang ste de la spyi dang ni // gzhi mthun spyod yul can dag gi / shes pa dang ni brjod pa yis //
translated: In that way, the generalüîΩAnd the objects of those who have a common locusüîΩExpand the conventional meaning of words

original: tha snyad nor don can rgyas byed //
analyzed: tha snyad nor don can rgyas byed //
translated: Through consciousness and expressions.

original: dngos po kun gyi de kun kyang //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi de kun kyang //
translated: All of those of all things

original: phan tshun med la brten pa ste //
analyzed: phan tshun med la brten pa ste //
translated: Are mutually dependent,üîΩAnd are not established by their own nature.

original: des na gzhan sel yul can dang // gang la dngos dang 'brel yod pa //
analyzed: des na gzhan sel yul can dang // gang la dngos dang 'brel yod pa //
translated: Is related to the thing.

original: dngos po med pa'i rten yin te //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i rten yin te //
translated: It is the basis of the non-thing.

original: rjes dpag ji skad bshad ji bzhin //
analyzed: rjes dpag ji skad bshad ji bzhin //
translated: Just as inference is explained.

original: 'khrul par 'dra yang gzhan la min //
analyzed: 'khrul par 'dra yang gzhan la min //
translated: Though similar in error, it is not for others.

original: mar me'i 'od la nor bu bzhin //
analyzed: mar me'i 'od la nor bu bzhin //
translated: Like a jewel in the light of a lamp.

original: de la'ang du ma 'bras gcig can //
analyzed: de la'ang du ma 'bras gcig can //
translated: It also has many results as one.

original: de 'bras can min gzhan rten can //
analyzed: de 'bras can min gzhan rten can //
translated: It is not the result of that, but based on others.

original: brjod dang shes pas gcig nyid du /
analyzed: brjod dang shes pas gcig nyid du /
translated: By expression and cognition, it makes one

original: tha dad rab tu 'jug par byed //
analyzed: tha dad rab tu 'jug par byed //
translated: Engage in difference.

original: de bzhin gcig kyang du ma byed //
analyzed: de bzhin gcig kyang du ma byed //
translated: Likewise, even one makes many.

original: de'i dngos yongs su bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de'i dngos yongs su bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to fully demonstrate its entity,

original: de yi 'bras can min don @286b las ;
analyzed: de yi 'bras can min don @286b las ;
translated: From the meaning of that which is not the result,

original: / tha dad pas chos sna tshogs shes //
analyzed: / tha dad pas chos sna tshogs shes //
translated: It is known as the various phenomena by difference.

original: sgra don 'di dang gzhi mthun nyid //
analyzed: sgra don 'di dang gzhi mthun nyid //
translated: The common locus of this meaning of sound

original: yod pa min yang ji lta bur //
analyzed: yod pa min yang ji lta bur //
translated: Does not exist. But how?

original: grags pa bzhin du brjod ba ste //
analyzed: grags pa bzhin du brjod ba ste //
translated: As it is known, it is expressed.

original: dngos po 'di ni mi srid do //
analyzed: dngos po 'di ni mi srid do //
translated: This thing is impossible.üîΩThe presentation of phenomena and subjects

original: chos dang chos can rnam gzhag dang // tha dad tha dad min ci 'dra //
analyzed: chos dang chos can rnam gzhag dang // tha dad tha dad min ci 'dra //
translated: Is similar to difference and non-difference.

original: de nyid don ni ma brtags pa ;
analyzed: de nyid don ni ma brtags pa ;
translated: The meaning of reality is not examined.

original: /'jig rten ji ltar grags de la //
analyzed: /'jig rten ji ltar grags de la //
translated: The world is accepted just as it is.üîΩThe wise have taught that all

original: de bzhin kho nar brten nas ni //üîΩbsgrub bya sgrub pa kun gzhag pa //
analyzed: de bzhin kho nar brten nas ni // bsgrub bya sgrub pa kun gzhag pa //
translated: proofs and probandums are based on it.

original: dam pa'i don la 'jug bya'i phyir //üîΩmkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa yin //üîΩdam pa'i don gyis don rnams ni //
analyzed: dam pa'i don la 'jug bya'i phyir // mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa yin // dam pa'i don gyis don rnams ni //
translated: In order to enter into the ultimate,üîΩThe ultimate is not a different object

original: rang gis 'dre dang tha dad med //
analyzed: rang gis 'dre dang tha dad med //
translated: from the object that is the conventional.üîΩThe mind is polluted by the thought

original: de la ngo bo gcig pa dang // du ma blo yis bslad pa yin //
analyzed: de la ngo bo gcig pa dang // du ma blo yis bslad pa yin //
translated: that it is either one or many.

original: de spyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i //
analyzed: de spyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i //
translated: The distinction between universals and

original: bye brag 'di ni blo don la //
analyzed: bye brag 'di ni blo don la //
translated: particulars is a mental imputation.üîΩThe distinction of phenomena isüîΩimagined in dependence on that.

original: de nyid la gzhan las ldog pas //üîΩchos kyi bye brag rab tu brtag / bsgrub bya sgrub par rtogs pa la //
analyzed: de nyid la gzhan las ldog pas // chos kyi bye brag rab tu brtag / bsgrub bya sgrub par rtogs pa la //
translated: The exclusion of other is in that itself.

original: dngos po mthong ba nyams pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dngos po mthong ba nyams pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the perception of things is lostüîΩin the understanding of the probandum,

original: khyad par spyi dang 'dres pa 'dir //
analyzed: khyad par spyi dang 'dres pa 'dir //
translated: the particular and the universal

original: rang gi mtshan nyid gzung bya min //üîΩde ni spyi dang khyad par gyi //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid gzung bya min // de ni spyi dang khyad par gyi //
translated: are not apprehended as their own characteristics.üîΩThat is not apprehended in any way

original: rnam sogs cir yang gzung bya min //
analyzed: rnam sogs cir yang gzung bya min //
translated: as a universal or a particular.

original: bye brag khyad par mang po rnams //
analyzed: bye brag khyad par mang po rnams //
translated: Because many particulars are not

original: de gcig la ni mi rung phyir //
analyzed: de gcig la ni mi rung phyir //
translated: suitable for a single one,

original: de yi ngo bo kun las log / de de bzhin du rtogs byed pa'i //
analyzed: de yi ngo bo kun las log / de de bzhin du rtogs byed pa'i //
translated: Its nature is contrary to all of them.

original: sgra yod ma yin rtogs pa yang //
analyzed: sgra yod ma yin rtogs pa yang //
translated: There is no word to cause one to understand it as it is.

original: spyi nyid du ni 'jug phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi nyid du ni 'jug phyir ro //
translated: Because it is engaged in the universal.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is the summary verse.

original: yang ci'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid la sgra rnams mi sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid la sgra rnams mi sbyor zhe na /
translated: Why are words not applied to the own-characteristic?

original: sgra rnams kyis ni brdar btags ston //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyis ni brdar btags ston //
translated: Words indicate the object as a conventional symbol.

original: de ni tha snyad ched du byas //
analyzed: de ni tha snyad ched du byas //
translated: That is done for the sake of conventional usage.

original: de tshe rang gi mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: de tshe rang gi mtshan nyid med //
translated: At that time there is no own-characteristic.

original: des na de la brdar ma yin //
analyzed: des na de la brdar ma yin //
translated: Therefore, it is not a conventional symbol.

original: sgra rnams kyis ni brdar btags pa'i don rab tu ston par byed la /
analyzed: sgra rnams kyis ni brdar btags pa'i don rab tu ston par byed la /
translated: Words indicate the object as a conventional symbol.

original: brda yang ci nas kyang dus phyis brdar byas pa'i sgra 'di las don 'di rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas tha snyad kyi don du 'dogs na /
analyzed: brda yang ci nas kyang dus phyis brdar byas pa'i sgra 'di las don 'di rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas tha snyad kyi don du 'dogs na /
translated: And the conventional symbol is made for the sake of conventional usage, thinking, ‚ÄúBy this word that has been conventionally established later on, this object will be understood.‚Äù

original: sngar rang gi mtshan nyid la brdar byas pa'i sgra phyis sbyor ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar rang gi mtshan nyid la brdar byas pa'i sgra phyis sbyor ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to apply a word that has been conventionally established with regard to the own-characteristic later on.

original: de ni bsal ba yul dang dus kyi tha dad pa la mi 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni bsal ba yul dang dus kyi tha dad pa la mi 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the exclusion is not related to a difference of place and time.

original: de lta bas na rang gi mtshan nyid la brdar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na rang gi mtshan nyid la brdar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word does not indicate the particular.

original: 'o na ci tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa khyad par zhig sgra rnams kyis brjod de /üîΩde bas na tha snyad kyi dus na @287a * //
analyzed: 'o na ci tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa khyad par zhig sgra rnams kyis brjod de / de bas na tha snyad kyi dus na @287a * //
translated: Well, then, do the words indicate a difference or non-difference?

original: med pa'i nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'i nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of non-existence at the time of conventional usage.üîΩThat is not so.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / ci ltar skyes bu don byed par //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / 'di ltar / ci ltar skyes bu don byed par //
translated: For,

original: nus pa shes nas de bsgrub phyir //üîΩ'jug par 'gyur zhes don rnams la //
analyzed: nus pa shes nas de bsgrub phyir // 'jug par 'gyur zhes don rnams la //
translated: Having understood the person who is able to accomplish the purpose,üîΩone engages in the activity in order to accomplish that purpose.

original: rjod par byed pa sbyor bar byed //üîΩ'jig rten la ni 'di brda mi byed pa'am /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa sbyor bar byed // 'jig rten la ni 'di brda mi byed pa'am /
translated: Thus, the speaker applies the word to the object.

original: sgra mi sbyor bas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i nya mang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgra mi sbyor bas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i nya mang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med pa nyid do //
translated: There is no such thing as the world being afflicted by the non-indication or non-application of the word.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well, then, what is it?

original: 'di'i rtsom pa 'bras bu'i don can ril mkho ba kho nar brtsi ste /
analyzed: 'di'i rtsom pa 'bras bu'i don can ril mkho ba kho nar brtsi ste /
translated: The entire composition is only considered to be for the purpose of the result.

original: rtsom pa 'bras bu med pa ni yal bar dor bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsom pa 'bras bu med pa ni yal bar dor bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the undertaking of a composition that is fruitless is to be rejected.

original: de bas na 'ga' zhig la sgra sbyor ba 'dis kyang 'bras bu 'ga' kho na la blta ba'i rigs so //
analyzed: de bas na 'ga' zhig la sgra sbyor ba 'dis kyang 'bras bu 'ga' kho na la blta ba'i rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is proper to employ this verbal expression only with reference to some result.

original: de ni thams cad kyang 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dag 'dor ba dang thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ni thams cad kyang 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dag 'dor ba dang thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: And that is the acquisition of what is desired and the avoidance of what is not desired, which is characterized by the attainment of the former and the nonattainment of the latter.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dag gi bsgrub pa dang sgrub pa ma yin par shes par byas nas /üîΩde la 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag bya ba'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dag gi bsgrub pa dang sgrub pa ma yin par shes par byas nas / de la 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag bya ba'am /
translated: Therefore, having understood what is to be accomplished and what is not to be accomplished with regard to what is desired and what is not desired,üîΩone should engage in and desist from that.

original: byed du gzhug pa'am /
analyzed: byed du gzhug pa'am /
translated: One should either do it oneself or cause another to do it.

original: sbyor ba la gus par 'gyur ba'i sgra rnams sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba la gus par 'gyur ba'i sgra rnams sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should employ those verbal expressions that are conducive to application.

original: de lta ma yin na yal bar dor bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde la rigs don byed rung min //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na yal bar dor bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // de la rigs don byed rung min //
translated: Otherwise, it is to be rejected.üîΩThe genus is not fit to perform the function.

original: rigs ni gzhon pa dang bzho ba la sogs pa 'ga' la yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs ni gzhon pa dang bzho ba la sogs pa 'ga' la yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: The genus does not exist in any particular thing, such as a calf or milk.

original: de lta bu'i skabs med par 'jig rten na tha snyad dag la sgra sbyor ba yang med do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i skabs med par 'jig rten na tha snyad dag la sgra sbyor ba yang med do //
translated: Without such a time, there would be no conventional usage of terms in the world.üîΩ

original: gal te gsal bar bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te gsal bar bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: And if there were no such thing as a universal, then there would be no such thing as the application of words to the conventions of the world.üîΩIf you say that the word is applied to the individual because it cannot be applied to the universal,

original: mtshon zin pas mtshon par bya ba'i rigs brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: mtshon zin pas mtshon par bya ba'i rigs brjod do zhe na /
translated: then the word would be applied to what is already indicated.

original: 'brel pa yin du zin kyang sgras ma brjod pa la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'brel pa yin du zin kyang sgras ma brjod pa la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: But even if there were a connection, how could the word be applied to what is not expressed?

original: 'ga' zhig la 'khar ba chod cig ces smras na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la 'khar ba chod cig ces smras na /
translated: For example, if someone says, ‚ÄúCut the stick,‚Äù

original: 'khar ba thogs pa gcod pa ni med do //
analyzed: 'khar ba thogs pa gcod pa ni med do //
translated: the stick-holder is not cut.

original: mi srid pa'i phyir bsal ba la 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir bsal ba la 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not applied to the individual because that is impossible.

original: de ltar na rnar mi 'ong ba smra bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar na rnar mi 'ong ba smra bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: For in that case, the word would be applied to what is not heard,

original: de las gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: de las gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin te ;
translated: and it would not be applied to anything else.

original: glang 'jo bar brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: glang 'jo bar brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: It would be like the word ‚Äúcow.‚Äù

original: don gzhan brjod na don gzhan mtshon pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan brjod na don gzhan mtshon pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And if the word expresses a different meaning, it does not indicate a different meaning.

original: 'brel pa yin du zin kyang 'khar ba zhes bya ba'i sgras 'khar ba thogs pa rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: 'brel pa yin du zin kyang 'khar ba zhes bya ba'i sgras 'khar ba thogs pa rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: For example, even if there were a connection, the word ‚Äústick‚Äù does not indicate the stick-holder.

original: gal te 'brel pa ma nges pa can nyid kyi phyir de la mi 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa ma nges pa can nyid kyi phyir de la mi 'jug go zhe na /
translated: If you say that it does not apply to that because the relation is not ascertained,

original: de ni rigs @287b la yang mtshungs te /
analyzed: de ni rigs @287b la yang mtshungs te /
translated: then the same is true of the universal.

original: bsal ba rnams bsal na rigs 'ba' zhig 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsal ba rnams bsal na rigs 'ba' zhig 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For when the particulars are removed, only the universal remains.

original: spun drung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra rnams ni 'brel pa can gyi sgra yin pa'i phyir gzhan 'phen par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: spun drung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra rnams ni 'brel pa can gyi sgra yin pa'i phyir gzhan 'phen par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Words such as ‚Äúbrother‚Äù and so on are words that have a related object, and so they imply something else.

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i sgra ni de ltar 'brel pa can rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i sgra ni de ltar 'brel pa can rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: But words such as ‚Äúcow‚Äù do not express a related object,

original: rigs bsal ba dang bral ba can dag gis kyang de'i sgra dag las rtag tu rjes su 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs bsal ba dang bral ba can dag gis kyang de'i sgra dag las rtag tu rjes su 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because even when the universal is separated from the particulars, the words would always be applied.

original: gal te dus thams cad du de dang 'brel bar rung ba nyid du shes pa'i phyir 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dus thams cad du de dang 'brel bar rung ba nyid du shes pa'i phyir 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is accepted because it is known that it is always suitable to be related to that,

original: 'o na ni dus thams cad du ba lang zhes bya ba'i sgra las 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni dus thams cad du ba lang zhes bya ba'i sgra las 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù would not be applied at all times.

original: lhan cig pa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i gnas skabs dag tu khyad par du ma 'phangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig pa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i gnas skabs dag tu khyad par du ma 'phangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the difference between the two is not indicated, whether they are simultaneous or not.

original: gal te bsal ba dang 'brel pa can gyi rigs brjod pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bsal ba dang 'brel pa can gyi rigs brjod pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because the universal is mentioned as being related to the individual,

original: 'o na ni de yang de'i khyad par nyid du gnas pas bsal ba 'phangs pa kho na'i phyir de dang ldan pa brjod par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni de yang de'i khyad par nyid du gnas pas bsal ba 'phangs pa kho na'i phyir de dang ldan pa brjod par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then since that is also a particular of the individual, the individual is mentioned because the universal is indicated.

original: rigs pa dang bsal ba dag 'brel ba yang 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: rigs pa dang bsal ba dag 'brel ba yang 'ga' yang med de /
translated: There is no connection between the universal and the individual at all,

original: phan tshun bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid du phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid du phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no benefit in their being the object produced and the producer of each other.

original: de'i phyir mtshon par yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshon par yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore it is not logical to indicate the universal.

original: de lta bas na rigs la sgra sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na rigs la sgra sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore the word is not applied to the universal,

original: 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is fruitless.

original: de lta na 'o na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na /
translated: If that is so,

original: de lta na /
analyzed: de lta na /
translated: then

original: don byed / nus pa zhes bya ba de la sgra sbyor ro zhe na /
analyzed: don byed / nus pa zhes bya ba de la sgra sbyor ro zhe na /
translated: the word is applied to the object that is able to perform a function.

original: de yang ni /
analyzed: de yang ni /
translated: But that

original: ci'i phyir dngos su sbyor mi byed //
analyzed: ci'i phyir dngos su sbyor mi byed //
translated: Why does it not actually apply to the manifested thing?

original: gal te bsal ba la sgra sbyor bas 'bras bu dang ldan pa yin na sgra de ci'i phyir bsal ba rnams la dngos su mi sbyor /
analyzed: gal te bsal ba la sgra sbyor bas 'bras bu dang ldan pa yin na sgra de ci'i phyir bsal ba rnams la dngos su mi sbyor /
translated: If the word is related to the manifested thing, and is thus fruitful, why does the word not actually apply to the manifested thing?

original: de la bar du gcod pas gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de la bar du gcod pas gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
translated: What use is it for something else to intervene, since it is related to the word?

original: gal te mtha' yas phyir 'di mtshungs //
analyzed: gal te mtha' yas phyir 'di mtshungs //
translated: If you say that it is the same because of infinity,

original: gal te 'di snyam du bsal ba rnams ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir sgras brjod par mi nus so snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du bsal ba rnams ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir sgras brjod par mi nus so snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that the manifested things are infinite in number, and so cannot be expressed by words,

original: de lta yin na mtha' yas pa 'di ni de dang ldan pa la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de lta yin na mtha' yas pa 'di ni de dang ldan pa la yang mtshungs so //
translated: then the same is true of the infinite number of things that possess the word.

original: rigs kyi khyad par du byas pa'i bsal ba dag kyang brjod par bya ba kho na yin pas 'brel pa ma byas pa can ni brjod du mi rung ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar de la 'brel pa bya dgos na de @288a * //
analyzed: rigs kyi khyad par du byas pa'i bsal ba dag kyang brjod par bya ba kho na yin pas 'brel pa ma byas pa can ni brjod du mi rung ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar de la 'brel pa bya dgos na de @288a * //
translated: Moreover, the manifested things that are distinguished by their class are also what is to be expressed. Since what is not related cannot be expressed, it is necessary to relate the word to the manifested thing.

original: yang mi nus so //
analyzed: yang mi nus so //
translated: But that is impossible.

original: gal te de dang 'brel pa can la byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te de dang 'brel pa can la byas pa'i phyir /
translated: If you say that it is related to that which is made related to it,

original: de la yang byas pa kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang byas pa kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is only the action that is the same,

original: 'di la bshad zin te /
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin te /
translated: then this has already been explained.

original: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang gcig la byas pas gzhan la rtogs pa ni med la /
analyzed: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang gcig la byas pas gzhan la rtogs pa ni med la /
translated: Even if there were a relationship, it is not the case that one understands another thing through the action of one thing.

original: 'brel pa yang med do zhes bya ba yin no ;
analyzed: 'brel pa yang med do zhes bya ba yin no ;
translated: And there is no relationship.

original: / gzhan yang /üîΩde byed de byed ma yin las //
analyzed: / gzhan yang / de byed de byed ma yin las //
translated: Moreover,üîΩHow is it that the action of that

original: log par mtshungs pa cis ma byas //üîΩdon byed pa gang gi dbang du byas nas don rnams gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: log par mtshungs pa cis ma byas // don byed pa gang gi dbang du byas nas don rnams gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: is not the same as the action of that which is not?üîΩWhy is it that a word is not applied to the mere difference of things,

original: de dag gi tha dad pa kho na la sgra ci ste mi sbyor /üîΩgal te de ldan nyes mtshungs phyir //
analyzed: de dag gi tha dad pa kho na la sgra ci ste mi sbyor / gal te de ldan nyes mtshungs phyir //
translated: in terms of which the meaning of the word is different from other things?üîΩIf you say that it is better to apply it to that which possesses it,

original: bla ste rigs gzhan mi dgos so //
analyzed: bla ste rigs gzhan mi dgos so //
translated: because the fault is the same, it is not necessary to apply it to another class.

original: gal te 'di snyam du sgra'i don de las gzhan pa las ldog pa la yang ldog pas khyad par du byas shing de dang ldan pa brjod pa'i phyir de'i phyogs las khyad par med de /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du sgra'i don de las gzhan pa las ldog pa la yang ldog pas khyad par du byas shing de dang ldan pa brjod pa'i phyir de'i phyogs las khyad par med de /
translated: If you think that it is applied to that which possesses it, because it is distinguished by the action of stopping in relation to that which is different from the meaning of the word, and because it expresses that which possesses it, then there is no difference in terms of that.

original: ldog pa dang rigs dang / ldog pa dang ldan pa dang / rigs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod snyam du sems na /
analyzed: ldog pa dang rigs dang / ldog pa dang ldan pa dang / rigs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod snyam du sems na /
translated: What is the difference between the terms ‚Äúexclusion‚Äù and ‚Äútype,‚Äù and ‚Äúpossessing exclusion‚Äù and ‚Äúpossessing a type‚Äù?

original: de dang ldan pa'i nyes pa lta bur gyur kyang bla ste /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i nyes pa lta bur gyur kyang bla ste /
translated: It is better to have the fault of possessing that,

original: rigs gzhan ni mi dgos so /
analyzed: rigs gzhan ni mi dgos so /
translated: but not the fault of possessing another type.

original: rigs khas len pas kyang gdon mi za bar dngos po rnams khas blangs dgos te /
analyzed: rigs khas len pas kyang gdon mi za bar dngos po rnams khas blangs dgos te /
translated: Those who accept a type must certainly accept entities,

original: de med na de yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na de yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if they do not exist, then that also does not exist.

original: gcig las tha dad pa de las gzhan pa rnams kyi tha mi dad pa de nyid des khyad par du byas pa'i don rnams la rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gcig las tha dad pa de las gzhan pa rnams kyi tha mi dad pa de nyid des khyad par du byas pa'i don rnams la rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: That which is different from one is different from another. That very nondifference from that is the meaning distinguished by that.

original: rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa yongs su spang bar bya bar mi nus ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa yongs su spang bar bya bar mi nus ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible to completely avoid error in every way.

original: don gzhan khas blang du ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan khas blang du ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no need to accept another meaning.

original: don de ni gzhan gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don de ni gzhan gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that meaning is established by another.

original: de la khas blangs pa yang gdon mi za bar bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan yang / de las gzhan pa yongs spangs nas //
analyzed: de la khas blangs pa yang gdon mi za bar bya dgos pa'i phyir ro // gzhan yang / de las gzhan pa yongs spangs nas //
translated: and it is necessary to accept that, without a doubt.üîΩMoreover,

original: 'jug 'gyur zhes kyang sgra brjod de //üîΩde yis de dag rnams las 'di //
analyzed: 'jug 'gyur zhes kyang sgra brjod de // de yis de dag rnams las 'di //
translated: the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used to eliminate other than that,

original: rnam mi gcod pa de ji ltar //
analyzed: rnam mi gcod pa de ji ltar //
translated: but how can it eliminate that from those?

original: 'di don rnams la sgra sbyor ba na mi 'dod pa yongs su spangs nas 'jug par 'gyur snyam nas sbyor te /
analyzed: 'di don rnams la sgra sbyor ba na mi 'dod pa yongs su spangs nas 'jug par 'gyur snyam nas sbyor te /
translated: When a word is applied to an object, it is applied with the thought that it will engage while excluding what is not desired.

original: de dang gzhan la yang 'jug tu snang la /
analyzed: de dang gzhan la yang 'jug tu snang la /
translated: But it appears to engage both that and other.

original: 'jug pa dang ldog pa yang 'jug tu snang na ni ming smos pa don med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan las ldog pa mi @288b brjod na ni gcig brjod pa la mi gus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ldog pa yang 'jug tu snang na ni ming smos pa don med pa'i phyir ro // gzhan las ldog pa mi @288b brjod na ni gcig brjod pa la mi gus pa'i phyir /
translated: If it appears to engage and disengage, then it would be pointless to mention the name.

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does not express the exclusion from other, then it would be meaningless to mention the name.

original: de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rnam par bcad pa brjod dgos so //
analyzed: de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rnam par bcad pa brjod dgos so //
translated: Therefore, it is necessary to express the exclusion.

original: de yang de las gzhan pa dag la tha mi dad pa yin la rigs kyi chos kyang yod do //
analyzed: de yang de las gzhan pa dag la tha mi dad pa yin la rigs kyi chos kyang yod do //
translated: And that is not different from that, and there is a property of the class.

original: de nges par khas blang ba can dang / gdon mi za bar brjod pa can dang / rigs kyi don rab tu sgrub pa yongs su bor nas don gzhan du rtog pa ni don med pa la gtsigs po cher 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: de nges par khas blang ba can dang / gdon mi za bar brjod pa can dang / rigs kyi don rab tu sgrub pa yongs su bor nas don gzhan du rtog pa ni don med pa la gtsigs po cher 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: It is pointless to abandon the meaning of the reason and to imagine some other meaning, for it is only a great fixation on the meaningless.

original: de ltar brtags pa bzhin du de mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar brtags pa bzhin du de mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, as it has been imagined, it is not tenable.

original: rnam par gcod par mi byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'jug pa'i yul brjod pas rigs smras so zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par gcod par mi byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'jug pa'i yul brjod pas rigs smras so zhe na /
translated: But it is not that it does not eliminate, for the reason is stated by expressing the domain of engagement.

original: gal te 'di la rnam gcod yod //üîΩsgra rnams dgos pa de tsam du //
analyzed: gal te 'di la rnam gcod yod // sgra rnams dgos pa de tsam du //
translated: If it has elimination,üîΩIs the purpose of words exhausted

original: zad pa min nam khyed la der //
analyzed: zad pa min nam khyed la der //
translated: In that alone for you?

original: spyi gzhan gyis ni ci zhig bya //
analyzed: spyi gzhan gyis ni ci zhig bya //
translated: What is the use of another universal there?

original: 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston to zhes smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston to zhes smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But didn‚Äôt you say that it reveals the domain of engagement?

original: de skad ni smras na rigs par ni ma smras te /
analyzed: de skad ni smras na rigs par ni ma smras te /
translated: You may say that, but you did not say it is tenable.

original: 'di ltar de ni 'jug par rung ba nyid ma yin no zhes de skad du bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni 'jug par rung ba nyid ma yin no zhes de skad du bstan zin to //
translated: Because it has been explained that it is not suitable to engage in that.

original: de'i sgo nas ma brjod pa la 'jug pa la yang bsal zin te /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas ma brjod pa la 'jug pa la yang bsal zin te /
translated: The refutation of the non-expression of the universal by the word has already been explained.

original: de dang ldan pa brjod na ni bar du gcod pa yod do //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa brjod na ni bar du gcod pa yod do //
translated: If the universal is expressed, then there is an obstruction.

original: rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag 'jug pa'i yul nyid yin na ldog pa dang / de dang ldan pa dag yin par ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: rigs dang de dang ldan pa dag 'jug pa'i yul nyid yin na ldog pa dang / de dang ldan pa dag yin par ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: If the universal and the possessor of the universal are the objects of the operation of the word, why not accept that they are the objects of the cessation of the word?

original: gal te ldog pa dngos po med pa nyid kyis sgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa dngos po med pa nyid kyis sgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the cessation is not established because it is a non-entity,

original: de ni rigs pa yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni rigs pa yang mtshungs so //
translated: then the same is true of the universal.

original: gal te de dang ldan pas bsgrub pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de dang ldan pas bsgrub pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because the possessor of the universal is established,

original: de ni ldog pa dang ldan par yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni ldog pa dang ldan par yang mtshungs so //
translated: then the same is true of the cessation and the possessor of the cessation.

original: ldog pa smra ba rnams kyi ltar na sgra'i shes pa dngos po mi 'dzin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa smra ba rnams kyi ltar na sgra'i shes pa dngos po mi 'dzin pa nyid yin te /
translated: According to those who maintain that the word ceases, the cognition of the word does not grasp the entity,

original: de ni 'khrul pa'i dbang gis byed pa po ma yin pa la yang byed pa por lhag par zhen pas 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa'i dbang gis byed pa po ma yin pa la yang byed pa por lhag par zhen pas 'jug par byed do //
translated: because it operates by the power of error, by the adherence to the agent as the agent, even though he is not the agent.

original: dngos po 'thob pa ni dngos po las skye bas de dang 'brel pa yin na 'gyur gyi gzhan du mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: dngos po 'thob pa ni dngos po las skye bas de dang 'brel pa yin na 'gyur gyi gzhan du mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: If obtaining an entity were related to the entity because it arose from the entity, it would be related to that, but not to anything else.

original: gal te dngos po las skye ba'i phyir mi 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po las skye ba'i phyir mi 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it were not mistaken because it arose from the entity,

original: ma yin te /üîΩde mi snang ba der lhag par zhen pa'i phyir dang / 'od la nor bur 'khrul bar snang bas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te / de mi snang ba der lhag par zhen pa'i phyir dang / 'od la nor bur 'khrul bar snang bas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it would not be mistaken.

original: gal te 'khrul pa'i phyir dngos po thob pa @289a * //
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa'i phyir dngos po thob pa @289a * //
translated: Because it is mistaken, it is not obtaining an entity.üîΩIf you say, ‚ÄúIt is not mistaken because it arises from the entity,‚Äù

original: ma yin no zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin no zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: ji skad bshad pa lta bu kho nas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa lta bu kho nas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is mistaken just as explained,

original: 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid ni log par snang ba yin la /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid ni log par snang ba yin la /
translated: the characteristic of a mistake is an appearance of what is not.

original: thob par byed pa ni de med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis yin gyi /
analyzed: thob par byed pa ni de med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis yin gyi /
translated: Obtaining is not by that, but by the fact that it does not occur without it.

original: snang ba la ltos pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba la ltos pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by relying on the appearance.

original: dngos po la ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin sems gtad pas 'jug na ni gzung bar bya ba spyi don byed par rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po la ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin sems gtad pas 'jug na ni gzung bar bya ba spyi don byed par rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it engages by directing the mind to the entity just as it is, then it is not a generally characterized object that is suitable to perform a function.

original: de la ni 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la ni 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it engages by directing the mind to the entity just as it is, then it does not engage it, because the apprehended object is a universal that is not suitable to perform a function.

original: gzhan la yang 'jug na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la yang 'jug na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it engages another, then there is the fault of overextension.

original: de dang ldan pa 'dzin na yang spyi don med pa la sogs par bshad zin to ;
analyzed: de dang ldan pa 'dzin na yang spyi don med pa la sogs par bshad zin to ;
translated: And if it apprehends that which possesses it, then the meaninglessness of the universal and so on has already been explained.

original: / gal te rigs gzung na yang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / gal te rigs gzung na yang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it apprehends the type, then it is related to it.

original: 'dres par snang ba'i blos 'jug par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'dres par snang ba'i blos 'jug par byed do zhe na /
translated: If it engages by means of a mind that perceives a mixture,

original: de'i tshe gcig gi yang rang gi ngo bor gnas pa ma bzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe gcig gi yang rang gi ngo bor gnas pa ma bzung ba'i phyir /
translated: then since it does not apprehend the individual nature of any one thing,

original: rigs kyang ma yin la de dang ldan pa yang ma yin pas gzhan gyi smra ba kho na la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyang ma yin la de dang ldan pa yang ma yin pas gzhan gyi smra ba kho na la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not the type and it is not that which possesses it, so it would be based on the mere words of another.

original: de lta na ni 'o na rjes su 'gro ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na rjes su 'gro ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir /
translated: If that is so, then since there is no concomitance at all,

original: rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa'i don rnams la de nyid 'di yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa'i don rnams la de nyid 'di yin no //
translated: it is not that very thing in individual things that are different by nature.

original: zhes ngo shes par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: zhes ngo shes par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But it is not recognized.

original: nyes pa med de /
analyzed: nyes pa med de /
translated: There is no fault.üîΩBecause

original: 'di ltar // tha dad kyang ni shes sogs don //
analyzed: 'di ltar // tha dad kyang ni shes sogs don //
translated: even though they are different, they are recognized

original: bya ba de dang de byed pa'i //
analyzed: bya ba de dang de byed pa'i //
translated: because they perform the same function.

original: de rnams mthong nas gzhan mthong yang //üîΩde las gzhan dang bral ba yi //
analyzed: de rnams mthong nas gzhan mthong yang // de las gzhan dang bral ba yi //
translated: Having seen them, one sees the other.

original: yul can gyi ni sgra rnams kyis //
analyzed: yul can gyi ni sgra rnams kyis //
translated: The words of the subjectüîΩcombine and recognize

original: lhan cig sbyor nas ngo shes byed //
analyzed: lhan cig sbyor nas ngo shes byed //
translated: the object that is free from the other.

original: 'di ni bshad zin te /
analyzed: 'di ni bshad zin te /
translated: This has already been explained.

original: dngos po tha dad kyang don 'dra ba dag byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad kyang don 'dra ba dag byed pa yin te /
translated: Even though things are different, they perform the same function,

original: mig la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba yin no ;
analyzed: mig la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba yin no ;
translated: like the eye and so on.üîΩWhen one sees that they perform the same function, such as the function of consciousness, the cognition ‚ÄúThat is this‚Äù arises from the mere nature of things that are different from other things.

original: / de dag la shes pa la sogs pa'i don byed pa gcig pa de mthong ba la gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid kho nas de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i shes pa de las ldog pa'i yul can gyi sgra dang 'brel
analyzed: / de dag la shes pa la sogs pa'i don byed pa gcig pa de mthong ba la gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid kho nas de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i shes pa de las ldog pa'i yul can gyi sgra dang 'brel
translated: The words of the subject combine with that cognition that is free from the other.

original: pa khyad par bsres pa rang nyams su myong ba'i bag chags sad pas skyed par byed do //
analyzed: pa khyad par bsres pa rang nyams su myong ba'i bag chags sad pas skyed par byed do //
translated: It is produced by the activation of the latent predispositions that are mixed with the specific experience.

original: de lta ma yin na blo khyad par can bsre ba can du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na blo khyad par can bsre ba can du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the special mind would not be mixed.

original: dper na ltung la brgyus pa dag lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na ltung la brgyus pa dag lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the case of the one who is bound by a single fault.

original: de la ltung ba gcig dang ldan pa yang gzhan la de nyid 'di yin no snyam du mi sems kyi /
analyzed: de la ltung ba gcig dang ldan pa yang gzhan la de nyid 'di yin no snyam du mi sems kyi /
translated: One who possesses a single fault does not think, ‚ÄúThis is the same as the other.‚Äù

original: 'on kyang de 'di la yod do snyam @289b mo ;
analyzed: 'on kyang de 'di la yod do snyam @289b mo ;
translated: However, he thinks, ‚ÄúThis exists in that.‚Äù

original: / ngo shes pa ni de lta yang ma yin no //
analyzed: / ngo shes pa ni de lta yang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not like that for recognition.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa yin no //
translated: It is like thinking, ‚ÄúThis is the same as that.‚Äù

original: de bas na gcig cig tu ma mthong ba la yang khyad par bsre ba dang ldan par rigs pa ni ma yin no /
analyzed: de bas na gcig cig tu ma mthong ba la yang khyad par bsre ba dang ldan par rigs pa ni ma yin no /
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that the special mind is mixed in the case of one who does not see the one as the same.

original: 'khrul pa'i dbang gis de ltar snang ba la ni 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i dbang gis de ltar snang ba la ni 'gal ba med do //
translated: There is no contradiction in the appearance of the one as the same through the power of error.

original: gal te rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir 'khrul par rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir 'khrul par rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not reasonable that there is error because there is no reason for it,

original: dngos po don de gcig byed pa de dag nyid nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas rang bzhin gyis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu can gyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: dngos po don de gcig byed pa de dag nyid nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas rang bzhin gyis 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu can gyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: The reason is that those very things that are the objects of the activity of the thing are the cause of the latent potentialities of the conceptual thoughts that have the effect of natural error, by way of being experienced.

original: smig rgyu la sogs pa la chu la sogs par 'khrul pa'i rgyu yang tha dad kyang rnam pa tha mi dad par bsnyems pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan nyams su myong ba skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo de dag nyid yin no //
analyzed: smig rgyu la sogs pa la chu la sogs par 'khrul pa'i rgyu yang tha dad kyang rnam pa tha mi dad par bsnyems pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan nyams su myong ba skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo de dag nyid yin no //
translated: The cause of error with respect to water, etc., in a mirage, etc., is also those very things that generate the experience of the reason for the cognition that is inflated with respect to the undifferentiated aspects.

original: de la gang de ltar shes par 'gyur ba gzhan spyi ni cung zad kyang med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de la gang de ltar shes par 'gyur ba gzhan spyi ni cung zad kyang med pa kho na'o //
translated: In that regard, there is not the slightest other universal that would be known in that way.

original: 'on te yod na ni don yod pa 'dzin pa'i blo 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te yod na ni don yod pa 'dzin pa'i blo 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it does exist, then the cognition that apprehends an existent object would not be erroneous.

original: gal te yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is erroneous because it superimposes an unreal aspect,

original: 'o na ni des de dag gi spyi 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni des de dag gi spyi 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: then it does not apprehend their universals.

original: des rnam pa gang kho na sgro 'dogs par byed pa de nyid 'di'i yul yin no //
analyzed: des rnam pa gang kho na sgro 'dogs par byed pa de nyid 'di'i yul yin no //
translated: The object of that is just that aspect which is reified.

original: yul du ma byas pa la ni sgro gdags par mi nus pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yul du ma byas pa la ni sgro gdags par mi nus pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not possible to reify that which is not taken as an object,

original: rnam pa gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan bzhin no //
translated: like another aspect.

original: de yang de la med pas spyi ma yin no //üîΩgal te spyi 'dzin pa yod na der sgro 'dogs kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang de la med pas spyi ma yin no // gal te spyi 'dzin pa yod na der sgro 'dogs kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: And that is not in that, so it is not a universal.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If there is a cognition of a universal, it is reified there, but not elsewhere, because that would be absurd.

original: 'bras bu gcig byed pa can 'dzin pa yod na ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig byed pa can 'dzin pa yod na ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: If there is a cognition of a single effect, why not accept that?

original: spyi 'dod pas kyang gdon mi za bar bsal ba rnams kyi don gcig bskyed pa'i nus pa ni 'dod par bya dgos so //
analyzed: spyi 'dod pas kyang gdon mi za bar bsal ba rnams kyi don gcig bskyed pa'i nus pa ni 'dod par bya dgos so //
translated: Even if one accepts a universal, one must certainly accept that the individual things have the capacity to produce a single effect.

original: de'i phyir gzhan dag las tha dad pa de dag kho nas shes pa de lta bu bskyed na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan dag las tha dad pa de dag kho nas shes pa de lta bu bskyed na /
translated: Therefore, if those very individual things, which are different from other things, produce such a cognition,

original: de la spyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de la spyis ci zhig bya /
translated: what is the use of a universal?

original: gal te dngos po ji lta ba bzhin khyad par ma 'dres pa can kho na ci ste mi rtogs shen /
analyzed: gal te dngos po ji lta ba bzhin khyad par ma 'dres pa can kho na ci ste mi rtogs shen /
translated: If it is asked why a cognition that is not mixed with other particulars, just as they are, is not produced,

original: ma rig pa'i mthus rnam par rtog pa rnams la nus pa 'di med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mthus rnam par rtog pa rnams la nus pa 'di med do //
translated: But this power does not exist in the conceptual thoughts due to the power of nescience.

original: phyi rol gyi don kho na la ltos nas 'khrul par 'gyur ba yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don kho na la ltos nas 'khrul par 'gyur ba yang ma yin gyi /
translated: And it is not that error occurs only in dependence on external objects.

original: 'on kyang nang gi bslad pa las kyang 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang nang gi bslad pa las kyang 'gyur te /
translated: But it also occurs due to internal corruption.

original: skra la sogs par 'khrul pa bzhin no //üîΩma rig pa @290a * //
analyzed: skra la sogs par 'khrul pa bzhin no // ma rig pa @290a * //
translated: For example, the error of hair-nets, etc.üîΩIf it is corruption because it arises from nescience, then it follows that the eye, etc.

original: las 'byung ba'i phyir bslad pa yin na mig la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: las 'byung ba'i phyir bslad pa yin na mig la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: are also corruption.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because their characteristic is non-conceptual.

original: rnam par rtog pa nyid ma rig pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa nyid ma rig pa yin te /
translated: Nescience is just conceptual thought.

original: de ni ngo bo nyid kho nas phyin ci log pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo nyid kho nas phyin ci log pa yin no //
translated: It is just by nature erroneous.

original: dbang po'i shes pa rnams ni de ltar rnam par rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa rnams ni de ltar rnam par rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: The sense-cognitions are not like that, i.e., conceptual.

original: yang na de dag la'ang 'di nyes pa med de /
analyzed: yang na de dag la'ang 'di nyes pa med de /
translated: Or, even for them, this is not a fault,

original: gnyis med pa de dag gnyis su snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med pa de dag gnyis su snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because those non-dual cognitions appear as dual.

original: zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: This is how it should be explained.

original: thams cad bslang ba yin yang tshad ma dang der snang ba'i rnam par gzhag pa ni ji srid gnas gyur pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad bslang ba yin yang tshad ma dang der snang ba'i rnam par gzhag pa ni ji srid gnas gyur pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Even though all are false, the establishment of valid cognition and the appearance of its object is not a transformation,

original: bar du don byed par rung ba dang 'dod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar du don byed par rung ba dang 'dod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in the interim, the object is capable of effective action and one obtains the desired goal.

original: nor pa nyid yin yang rab tu zhi pa dang mthun pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: nor pa nyid yin yang rab tu zhi pa dang mthun pa'i phyir te /
translated: Even though it is false, it is conducive to peace,

original: ma la sogs par 'du shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ma la sogs par 'du shes pa bzhin no //
translated: like the idea of one‚Äôs mother being a whore.

original: smig rgyu la chur 'du shes pa dang / gzhan dngos po tha dad pa las skye ba dang 'khrul par khyad par med kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i don bya bar rung ba dang / mi rung ba las skya ba'i phyir don thob par byed pa dang /
analyzed: smig rgyu la chur 'du shes pa dang / gzhan dngos po tha dad pa las skye ba dang 'khrul par khyad par med kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i don bya bar rung ba dang / mi rung ba las skya ba'i phyir don thob par byed pa dang /
translated: The idea of water in a mirage and the idea of a thing arising from a different thing are not distinguished as to error, but the former is conducive to obtaining the desired goal and the latter is not, because the former is capable of effective action and the latter is not.

original: cig shos dag yin no //
analyzed: cig shos dag yin no //
translated: The other is not.

original: gal te mi rung ba las ji ltar skye zhe na /üîΩrnam par rtog pa rnams don dang 'brel par nges pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gal te mi rung ba las ji ltar skye zhe na / rnam par rtog pa rnams don dang 'brel par nges pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: If it is not capable of effective action, how can it arise?üîΩBecause there is no certainty that conceptual thoughts are related to their objects,

original: rnam par rtog rnams ni don ji lta ba bzhin skye ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog rnams ni don ji lta ba bzhin skye ba med pa nyid do //
translated: because conceptual thoughts do not arise in accordance with their objects.

original: smig rgyur mthong ba yod na chur 'khrul par 'gyur bas de las skye ba zhes bya'i chu ma yin pa dang bral ba'i don gyi rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rang gi ngo bo'i rjes su byed pa 'jog pas bskyed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no
analyzed: smig rgyur mthong ba yod na chur 'khrul par 'gyur bas de las skye ba zhes bya'i chu ma yin pa dang bral ba'i don gyi rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rang gi ngo bo'i rjes su byed pa 'jog pas bskyed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no
translated: If there were a seeing of a mirage, there would be a delusion of water. Therefore, the nature of the object that is free from the water that is said to arise from it is posited as the object that is the nature of the mirage itself. It is not generated by the water.

original: // de ni khyad par mtshon pa la mi bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // de ni khyad par mtshon pa la mi bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not eliminated in the illustration of the difference,

original: rang gi bag chags sang pa rkyen la ltos pas bskyed do //
analyzed: rang gi bag chags sang pa rkyen la ltos pas bskyed do //
translated: it is generated by the condition of the ripening of its own habitual tendencies.

original: de lta bas na 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa dngos po tha dad pa las skye ba can 'khrul pa las de nyid 'di yin no snyam du ngo shes pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog pa dngos po tha dad pa las skye ba can 'khrul pa las de nyid 'di yin no snyam du ngo shes pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, a mistaken conception that has a different thing as its object is generated from a mistake. It is the recognition that thinks, ‚ÄúThis is that.‚Äù

original: spyi tha dad pa mthong ba las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi tha dad pa mthong ba las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not from seeing a different universal.

original: tha mi dad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it from a nondifferent universal,

original: bsal ba bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsal ba bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because, like the illustration, it does not follow.

original: gzhan yang / gzhan gyi ltar na'ang blo de ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gzhan gyi ltar na'ang blo de ni //
translated: Moreover, according to the other system,

original: spyi ni 'ba' zhig nyid las yin //
analyzed: spyi ni 'ba' zhig nyid las yin //
translated: that cognition is from a universal alone.

original: gzhan gyis kyang blo 'di ni spyi 'ba' zhig las 'byung bar brjod par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang blo 'di ni spyi 'ba' zhig las 'byung bar brjod par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not right for others to say that this cognition arises from a universal alone.

original: rtag tu de tsam rnam @290b shes na ;
analyzed: rtag tu de tsam rnam @290b shes na ;
translated: If it always cognizes just that,

original: / bsal ba mi shes thal 'gyur phyir //
analyzed: / bsal ba mi shes thal 'gyur phyir //
translated: then it follows that it does not cognize particulars.

original: gal te blo 'dis rtag tu spyi kho na 'dzin par byed na shes pa 'dis bsal ba mi rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te blo 'dis rtag tu spyi kho na 'dzin par byed na shes pa 'dis bsal ba mi rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: If this cognition always apprehends a universal alone, then it would not cognize particulars at all.

original: de yi tshe na nam yang ni //üîΩde ldan 'brel pa ma bzung na //
analyzed: de yi tshe na nam yang ni // de ldan 'brel pa ma bzung na //
translated: At that time,üîΩif it never apprehends the connection with that,

original: de dang ldan nges mi 'gyur na //
analyzed: de dang ldan nges mi 'gyur na //
translated: then it would not be ascertained as possessing that.

original: de las ji ltar tha snyad 'dogs ;üîΩ/ gang gi tshe spyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pas khyad par rnams dmigs pa nyid du nye bar mi sbyor ba de'i tshe nam yang de dag 'brel par ma bzung bas 'di ni 'di'i spyi'o //
analyzed: de las ji ltar tha snyad 'dogs ; / gang gi tshe spyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pas khyad par rnams dmigs pa nyid du nye bar mi sbyor ba de'i tshe nam yang de dag 'brel par ma bzung bas 'di ni 'di'i spyi'o //
translated: How could it be designated as that?

original: 'di ni de dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni de dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When a consciousness apprehending a universal does not connect particulars as objects, then it never apprehends them as connected. Therefore, it would not be possible to say, ‚ÄúThis is its universal‚Äù or ‚ÄúThis possesses that.‚Äù

original: de lta na ni de rtogs pas de dang ldan pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni de rtogs pas de dang ldan pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, it would not engage in possessing that by understanding that.

original: don gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: don gzhan bzhin no //
translated: It is like another object.üîΩIf you think that the cognitions of the various manifestations

original: gal te dngos gcig grogs byed pa'i //üîΩbsal rnams shes pa'i rgyu zhe na //
analyzed: gal te dngos gcig grogs byed pa'i // bsal rnams shes pa'i rgyu zhe na //
translated: are caused by the one entity that assists them,

original: gal te 'di snyam du bsal ba rnams ni de'i dmigs pa'i dngos po'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du bsal ba rnams ni de'i dmigs pa'i dngos po'i rgyu yin la /
translated: If you think that the manifestations are the cause of the object that is their referent,

original: 'ba' zhig pa rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: but not of the cognition,

original: gang gi tshe 'di dag la gcig lhan cig byed pa yod pa de'i tshe de dang lhan cig tu 'dzin to snyam du sems na /üîΩdngos po gcig des de rnams kyi //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di dag la gcig lhan cig byed pa yod pa de'i tshe de dang lhan cig tu 'dzin to snyam du sems na / dngos po gcig des de rnams kyi //
translated: then when they are assisted by the one entity, you think that they are apprehended together with it.üîΩBut does that one entity remove

original: tha dad pa nyid sel tam ci //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid sel tam ci //
translated: the difference of those manifestations?

original: tha dad phyir ni de dag la //
analyzed: tha dad phyir ni de dag la //
translated: Because they are different,

original: gcig rnam shes kyi rgyur mi 'dod //
analyzed: gcig rnam shes kyi rgyur mi 'dod //
translated: we do not accept that one is the cause of the cognition of all.

original: gcig pu des de rnams kyi tha snyad pa nyid sel tam /
